Title Utility and Project managerUtility Management - Maintenance Project Management - Continuous Improvement - Sustainability - Energy Saving - Up to 160 Plus other benefit - Based on Pak ChongThe Client A well-known food producer The RoleManpower management to support Utilities & Facility operation 24/7 as per production plan and PM required.Support engineering team and provide solution, analysis and troubleshooting for machines equipment to keep machines are running 24/7.Operation management in Utilities supplies to production lines without shortagePreventive & Corrective maintenance in Utilities and Facility machines and serve to production with good efficient.Develops reviews and updates of machines operation preventive & corrective maintenance program to ensure the readiness of all the plant equipment in order to meet the production volume requirement.Plan and perform annually preventive maintenance for Electrical system 115KV - 22KV.Perform test and inspection the fire prevention system (Fire pump, Fire alarm system, sprinkler system, grounding system etc.) as regular basis to ensure the system is readiness for emergency case.Maintain and improve plant's infrastructure with efficient to compliance with law, regulatory and PI standard.Provide mandatory training plan for technician according to safety, law, FM global and others requirement.Monitoring and report monthly utility consumption and provide improvement needs.Set the preventive maintenance plan for weekly, monthly, quarterly and yearly basis and coordinate with machine maker or supplier for overhauling schedule.Provides appropriate counsel to subordinates. Coaches team for proper guidance in connection with their functions and responsibilities.Developing the Process parameter and continue improvement for productivities, Safety, food safety, and SustainabilityPerforms other tasks / duties in support of the goals and objective of the business.Follow QFS Procedure and monitoring process to ensure that Product without Quality Food safety IssueFollow Safety Procedure and monitoring process to ensure that machine and equipment without safety IssueFollowing job / task assignment from Engineering ManagerThe PersonMale / Female, age 35 - 48, with a degree in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering . Master's Degree or overseas education would be a plus 10+yrs experience in leading & managing Utility Maintenance Operation from Consumer / Food / FMCG industries with knowledge of Utility equipment & systems maintenance and related engineering improvement for Waste Water, Boiler, HVAC, Electrical Supply, and all other facilities within manufacturing companiesMust have experience with multi -national manufacturing companiesTeam leadership Good communication skills in EnglishIf you are interested, please apply via Jobs DBArgyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

As a Validation Engineering Supervisor, you will respond the management and execution of all validation activities related to production process.Client DetailsOur client is a leading medical devices company. Provide designs and delivers innovative products solutions to be prevention products and services to healthcare facilities.DescriptionProvide project support and guidance on validation/qualificationLead evaluate and validate the sterilisation process, equipment and procedures used in development and production of a variety of productsSupport the maintenance of assigned system validation state by developing, approving, and monitoring proper testing as part of the change control program for sterilisation and drying processesProfileBachelor's Degree in Engineering or other related fieldsMust have minimum 3 years of experience in validation or Quality Management for medical devices manufacturingSolid knowledge and experience in ISO 11135 and ISO 11137 are a mustGood communication (spoken and written) in Thai and English is mandatoryJob OfferExcellent and competitive package, including fringe benefits & welfare, depending on experienceOpportunity to work in global organisationTo apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Kornkanok Tiyakhun on +66 2 012 5056

TSK Engineering (Thailand) Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of TSUKISHIMA KIKAI, established in Thailand in 1993.We specialize in turnkey project, design, project management, procurement, construction, ME in Ethanol, chemical, waste treatment, food and beverage, sugar, etc.We are looking for qualified people to be a part of our growth and business expansion as follows:1. Cost EngineerBachelor’s degree in mechanical or chemical engineering.30 years old or aboveExperience in estimation work at least 3 yearsExperience in estimation work for chemical plant, EPC project.Experience in tank, piping design, equipment data sheet preparation will be an advantage.Knowledge of Auto CAD, P&ID drawing work, tank and vessel skeleton and piping layout for estimationKnowledge in international standards (TIS, ASME, JIS, etc.)Average command of spoken and written EnglishJob responsibility includes:design and prepare specification, proposal, and other documents review vendor proposal review layouts, P&ID, specifications, datasheets, etc. site survey Our employee benefits include:bonus and salary increase once a year transportation and accommodation support for site work annual leave, starting from 6 days after completing first year of work social security paid in full by Company group health and accident insurance, with additional medical fee support up to 1,000 Baht/monthannual medical examination  support for learning English or JapaneseInterested candidates are invited to send a resume inEnglish, with full details of your qualification, work experience, current and expected salary.

An exciting Lead Engineer (x1 vacancy) job has just become available at heavy machinery business based in Rayong, Thailand. This is a role for Lead Engineer who thrive on challenging opportunity. About the Lead Engineer Role:You will be leading the team and play a vital role to deliver sound and effective engineering. The salary range for this role is THB 100k - 120k per month + benefits + massive bonus.Key Responsibilities:Leading projects, work planning, directing and overseeing designers and engineers assigned to your projects, design reviews (both internal and with client), and checking deliverableDevelop study reports, proposals, scopes of work, schedules, material lists, design concepts, scope change documents, and corporate guidelineManage scope, schedule, and budgetManage the engineering and design process from inception to completionVisit customer sites for field workAssist in commissioning and start upReport to Expat General ManagerDevelop and implement specific plant policies/ procedures as required To succeed in the Lead Engineer job, you will need to have experiences on heavy machine industry with the ability to work effectively and co-operatively with the team.Key Requirements:Bachelor's degree or higher in Mechanical or Civil Engineering or related field in heavy machine, construction manufacturing10 years of heavy industrial experience in a design or project engineering role. Solid background in heavy machine businessProject management experienceStrong knowledge of mechanical engineering principles with an emphasis on mechanics, heavy lifting and transport businessMust have strong people management, leader skill and presentation skillGood command in English language This heavy machine company needs no introduction and is recognised as the leader in their field of expertise. The culture is demanding but if you are confident and have a can-do attitude the potential rewards are significant and there are great opportunities to progress in this dynamic company.If you are a driven and determined Lead Engineer with proven track record of achievements in manufacturing environment, this is an excellent opportunity for you.Apply today for this exciting opportunity.Robert Walters Recruitment (Thailand) LimitedRecruitment License No.: น. 1188 / 2551

job_responsibilities: ['Position: Engineering ManagerJob Type: PermanentLocation: ChachoengsaoWorking Day:5 days per weekSalary Range: 60,000 – 100,000 THB (up to experience)Benefit: Fixed Bonus, Variable Bonus, Provident Fund, Group Insurance, etc.Responsibilities:To meet production target which conform to customers’ specification and delivery schedule,by ensuring that all inter-departmental activities are well coordinatedTo initiate and implement preventive/corrective action to resolve production-related qualityand technical issue.To ensure that all engineering documentation pertaining to process, product structure, etc. areaccurately updated and maintained in accordance with the Quality System. requirement.To implement cost-effective measures and established acceptable quality level of works,to achieve lower production costs and improve product quality.To ensure that all resources and information pertinent to satisfactory completion of assignedtasks are made available to subordinate staff.To ensure that the cost estimation of new enquiries as highlighted during the contractreview meeting, submitted to the Sales & Marketing - Department were as accurate,realistic and timely as possible.To develop and enhance the core competence of the Engineering group indie-cutting technique and other manufacturing processes or capabilities to meetthe growth objectives of the company.To supervise, monitor and motivate work of staff to ensure effective and satisfactoryPerformance of assigned tasks.To develop departmental budget, and monitor all expenses to budgeted figuresControlling and monitoring the preparation plan, tools and production process of all new products.Control and monitor the design of the Jig concept and layout concept of the new model']

']
job_qualifications: ["s:Male, Thai speaker and good command of English – written and spoken. 5 years of the oil refinery, storage terminal or pipeline technical, operation & maintenance experience.Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (Mechanical or Petrochemical). job_description: Job Description:Ensuring the industry best practice (API, EI) expectations are met at all times during all activities.Providing technical and engineering support to the terminal Manager as required.Supporting procurement officer on technical & engineering matter before coordinating with supplier and contractor.Handling admin work of EMOC process by following EMOC procedure. Ensuring that the site drawings (P&IDs) and other relevant material are kept up-to-date.Participating in the FEED, risk assessment, HAZOP of all engineering projects related to the terminal.Supervising and monitoring of projects in the terminal. Identifying problems of design, equipment and processes that work against optimal and safe functioning of the terminal and proffer solutions.Ensuring prompt completion of all project works in the terminal with minimum disruption to operations.Supporting the Jig EI 1530. Qualifications:Male, Thai speaker and good command of English – written and spoken. 5 years of the oil refinery, storage terminal or pipeline technical, operation & maintenance experience.Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (Mechanical or Petrochemical). Experience in a technical operational environment/good technical insight. Project management skills. Proven ability of good communications skills.

job_title: R&D Engineer @Saraburi (20K - 30K) (SDG-53100)/วิศวกร R&D
job_description: <Job Responsibilities>This position is in charge of developing new products and Improved product (From evaluation to trial production to mass production)Develop new products and improved products (Evaluation of new materials, Prototype evaluation)Plan and control the production of new products.Establish and control the QCPC (Quality control process chart) production standards.Enhance product quality And develop the production processControl and supervise the new raw materials low cost raw materialsOther tasks assigned<Necessary Skill / Experience >Thai nationality , Male/Female, age 23-30 years oldBachelor Degree of Chemical engineering or relatedR&D experience in Chemical industry for more than 1 yearGood command of English *for internal useHigh responsibility and be able to work under pressureGood computer skills in MS officeGood conceptual and problem solving skills<Preferable Skill / Experience>Working experience in Ceramic industryLanguages skillsEnglish:Conversational LevelJapanese:NoneWorkplace Area: Nong-Khae, SaraburiWorking Hour: 8:00-17:00(Mon - Fri , Sat ;None) About theBenefitsSalary: 20,000–30,000THBAbout the companyProducts: Manufacture and sale of refractories (Ceramic Tool for firing tableware and sanitary ware, ceramic capacitors, ferrites, etc. for electronic parts, powder metallurgy of automobile parts and for firing other automobile parts )Business Type: Glass / Ceramic / CementKeywordsChemical Engineer, R&DHOW TO APPLY,*** Please submit yourresume with recent photo, your current & expected salary, andreference:R&D Engineer @Saraburi (20K - 30K) (SDG-53100)*** Any query regarding this Job or application method, please call Tel. 02-021-0333RGF HR Agent Recruitment (Thailand) Co., Ltd.（株式会社リクルートホールディングスタイ法人）689 BHIRAJ TOWER at EmQuartier, 23rd Floor, Room No. 2304-2306Sukhumvit Road, North Klongton Sub-District, Vadhana District, Bangkok 1011Tel: 02-021-0333Website : www.rgf-hragent.asia/en/thailand

job_title: Colour Matcher  1 Position (Amatanakorn phase 8 Chonburi) /Colour Matcher 1 Position
job_description: Purpose of Job:To develop color of various global projects (Key account customers) to meet the target quality requirement and to be on time of development.This job function also involve the coordinate with Clariant affiliate for formulation transfer.Roles & ResponsibilityResponse to do Bill of material (BOM) of TAR.PrepareBar code Label ,Presentation card,Standard chips ,Standard sample ,Standard library physical,Standard library in I-match,Standard library in I-matchProvide and take care sample in sample areaProvide standard library of color matching.Response to provide master batch sample for Sales Personnel as requestTakes care and maintains all equipment used in performing the daily job; ; performs theFormal physical cleaning of such equipment to ensure that they are in good working condition.Performs other related duties of a similar type at a similar level.RequiredDiploma or bachelor’s degree in Polymer, Chemical or color scienceMinimum 3 year of Colour matching in processBasic background of pigment and polymerGood Visual color perception, Good color sensesAbility to work independently.Familiar with SAP program and Computer literacy.

Quality Specialist (Food) , ChonburiMale or female, aged 30 - 35 years old. Bachelor’s Degree in Food Science or any related field.Good command of English and computer literateAt least 7 years’ experience being responsible for food quality and food safety, food industrial is preferableBackground in BRC, AIB, FSSC, GMP, HACCP, HALAL, YUM Star, McD SQMS or other food safety standard.Strong analytical and problem solving skills are preferred.Able to articulate ideas well, enjoys problem solving & challenges with positive work attitude and approach.Interested applicants are invited to send resume, recent photograph and expected salary by mail or e-mail toManpower Thailand – Eastern Seaboard BranchAttn: Ms.Preechaya J.Tel: 086-7741797Email: preechaya.j @manpower.th.com

PURPOSE OF THE JOBThe core purpose of the Production Department Head is to ensure that compiling, premixing, milling, deairation, additions and filling are done accurately and correctly.To ensure that all production is completed effectively, efficiently and on time.To ensure that the plant & equipment are fully maintained at all times according to maintenance schedules.To ensure all staffs and supervisors are trained and qualified to handle their jobs.To ensure a safe and healthy working environment for all employees.Liaise with the process engineering department.Liaise with the R&D lab and QC lab.Liaise with the raw material planner.PRIMARY JOB OUTPUTSProduction function:Conduct production meetings every morning with Supervisors and Staffs.To implement the daily/weekly/monthly production plan.Ensure strict time management of all staff in the production division.Ensure that all the production equipment is fixed and maintained.Ensure all batch cards are correctly filled in and processed.Ensure all milling/processing data is captured and analyzed.Ensure that production liaise with the QC department on a daily basis.Ensure that production liaise with the R/M planner on a daily basis.Ensure that all FG will finish on time as per R/M planner confirmed to Sales.Check Filling/labeling procedures are followed.Analyze the losses and gains on batch cards.Supervise intermediate & NCP monthly stock takes and submit figures to admin.Ensure exterior waste area is always clean and collection of the main bin is done regularly.Monitor all preventive maintenance schedules.Manage the production and maintenance staffs.Update and review all work instruction and procedure in production & maintenance.Maintenance function:Ensure that maintenance spare part procedure is compiled with.Ensure that maintenance work shop is always clean, tools & m/c are located in their allocated spaces and all tools are stored correctly.Ensure that spare part store is always clean, spare parts are packed in their allocated spaces and that spare parts are stored correctly.Manage the monthly stock take for maintenance spare part on time and accuracy.Ensure that PM schedule always meet target.Ensure that machine break down can control (fixed & finished) in reasonable time frame.Ensure that maintenance requisition can closed in reasonable time frame.General function:Make sure that the whole factory, inside and outside is kept tidy and safe at all times (General housekeeping)Training of personnel in various departmentsKNOWLEDGE/SKILL/ EXPERIENCE/QUALIFICATIONSGood communication in Thai & English (spoken and written)Good understanding of the company’s process flow and business systemsStrong Leadership skillsAccuracy / attention to detailAssertivenessMaintain confidentialityTime managementDeadline drivenPeople management skillsMinimum qualification should be a Degree in Chemistry or EngineeringMust have a minimum of 5 years production experienceMust have a minimum of 3 years management experienceMust be able to solve problemsMust have excellent computer skillsAUTHORITY LEVELThe Production Department Head reports directly to the General Manager.The Production Department Head is appraised on an ongoing basis by the General Manager and Managing Director.GENERALThe Production Department Head shall perform and exercise all such duties in relation to the business of the Company as may from time to time be vested in or assigned to him by the Company.The Production Department Head shall comply with all directives from time to time given to him by the Company and with all rules and regulations from time to time laid down by the Company.The Production Department Head shall undergo / attend any training or other courses that the Company in its sole discretion may require from time to time.This Job Description updates the job description as set forth in the Employee’s original Contract of Employment.BENEFITSAnnual Check upProvident FundFood Allowance (Lunch)Service Loyalty and Employee AwardFive-day work weekMedical insurancePerformance bonusAmazon Colours Co., Ltd1/49 Moo 5, Bangpakong KM.46 from Bangkok (Chonburi-Motor Way),TFD Industrial Estate,Tambol Tasaan, Amphur Bangpakong,Chachoengsao 24130.

job_responsibilities: ['Responsibilities:Responsible for all operational matters related to field operations Assist and support all personnel in the division solving any problems related to field operationsInvestigate the cause of claims / complaints and propose solutions to the Business Manager in writingDiscuss with the clients for any matters related to field operations Control and supervise operations personnel to ensure all jobs are performed in compliance with WI, Company Rules and Regulations, relevant standards, business practice and safety rulesRegularly visit the sites and clients to enhance customer’s satisfaction Arrange specific training courses for operations personnel as and when necessaryManage and develop the efficiency and productivity of field operations Approve all inspection reports Prepare and submit Monthly Report to the Business Manager not later than the first week of next monthMaintain and keep OGC equipment and calibration to be ready for use Manage cost control related to the operation Check and approve daily time sheet for inspector ']
job_qualifications: ["s:Master's Degree of Business / MBA / Marketing / Chemical / Petrochemical Bachelor's Degree of Chemical Engineer / Chemistry 5 - 7 years of working experiences as inspector or supervisor in Oil, Gas & Chemical sector.Good command of spoken and written English Have own car with driving's license Good personality Good interpersonal skill Leadership with Team Working Excellent in presentation skill.  "]
job_description: Responsibilities:Responsible for all operational matters related to field operations Assist and support all personnel in the division solving any problems related to field operationsInvestigate the cause of claims / complaints and propose solutions to the Business Manager in writingDiscuss with the clients for any matters related to field operations Control and supervise operations personnel to ensure all jobs are performed in compliance with WI, Company Rules and Regulations, relevant standards, business practice and safety rulesRegularly visit the sites and clients to enhance customer’s satisfaction Arrange specific training courses for operations personnel as and when necessaryManage and develop the efficiency and productivity of field operations Approve all inspection reports Prepare and submit Monthly Report to the Business Manager not later than the first week of next monthMaintain and keep OGC equipment and calibration to be ready for use Manage cost control related to the operation Check and approve daily time sheet for inspector Qualifications:Master's Degree of Business / MBA / Marketing / Chemical / Petrochemical Bachelor's Degree of Chemical Engineer / Chemistry 5 - 7 years of working experiences as inspector or supervisor in Oil, Gas & Chemical sector.Good command of spoken and written English Have own car with driving's license Good personality Good interpersonal skill Leadership with Team Working Excellent in presentation skill.

job_responsibilities: [' Responsibilities :To establish and ensure consistency of the Quality/Safety objectives and their application relating to SGS Policy and Business.To establish, implement and maintain of the Quality/Safety Management System.To establish/review division procedure and other documents related to Quality/Safety Management System and communicate to related staff.To evaluate and report on the performance of the quality and safety system to General manager.To manage on the training need and training plan of division.To identify and record any business operation or quality/safety system non-conformitiesTo initiate action to prevent the occurrence of quality system, safety issue or operational non-conformity.To initiate, recommend or provide solutions through the appropriate channels.To verify the taking of corrective/ preventive actions and solutions.To co-ordinate audit for both internal / external audit and third parties for all registrations and other issues.To handle customer claim and complaint of division.To ensure available, proper and adequate facilities/ equipments for all inspection activities.']
job_qualifications: ['s :Bachelor Degree in Chemical Engineer, Chemical Science0-2 years in related field and quality assurance experience would be advantage.Fluent in both written and spoken English.Able to coordinate and motivate a team towards a common goal.Able to work independently and to coordinate several activities simultaneously.SGS (Thailand) Limited100 Nanglinchee ChongnonseeYannawa Bangkok 10120Tel. 02-678-1813 ext 1117 ']
job_description: Responsibilities :To establish and ensure consistency of the Quality/Safety objectives and their application relating to SGS Policy and Business.To establish, implement and maintain of the Quality/Safety Management System.To establish/review division procedure and other documents related to Quality/Safety Management System and communicate to related staff.To evaluate and report on the performance of the quality and safety system to General manager.To manage on the training need and training plan of division.To identify and record any business operation or quality/safety system non-conformitiesTo initiate action to prevent the occurrence of quality system, safety issue or operational non-conformity.To initiate, recommend or provide solutions through the appropriate channels.To verify the taking of corrective/ preventive actions and solutions.To co-ordinate audit for both internal / external audit and third parties for all registrations and other issues.To handle customer claim and complaint of division.To ensure available, proper and adequate facilities/ equipments for all inspection activities.Qualifications :Bachelor Degree in Chemical Engineer, Chemical Science0-2 years in related field and quality assurance experience would be advantage.Fluent in both written and spoken English.Able to coordinate and motivate a team towards a common goal.Able to work independently and to coordinate several activities simultaneously.SGS (Thailand) Limited100 Nanglinchee ChongnonseeYannawa Bangkok 10120Tel. 02-678-1813 ext 1117

job_responsibilities: ['We are looking for male/female to join us.Position: Piping Test Engineer (1 position)Direct Report to: Hydro Test SupervisorEmployment Status: TemporaryLocation: Laem Chabang Port, ChonburiResponsibilitiesSupport engineering, procurement and construction through all phases on all Piping Test mattersEnsure that Piping Test requirements are reflected in site design development and all relevant documentation.Participate in verifications of suppliers and subcontractorsVerify and accept Piping Test documentation, update ASTResponsible for implementing, follow up and reporting of Piping Test activities to plan.Responsible for meeting the projects HSE goals within areas of responsibilityShall be familiar with applicable statutory requirements, laws, rules and regulationsShall at all times encourage to and seek improvement.']

job_description: We are looking for male/female to join us.Position: Piping Test Engineer (1 position)Direct Report to: Hydro Test SupervisorEmployment Status: TemporaryLocation: Laem Chabang Port, ChonburiResponsibilitiesSupport engineering, procurement and construction through all phases on all Piping Test mattersEnsure that Piping Test requirements are reflected in site design development and all relevant documentation.Participate in verifications of suppliers and subcontractorsVerify and accept Piping Test documentation, update ASTResponsible for implementing, follow up and reporting of Piping Test activities to plan.Responsible for meeting the projects HSE goals within areas of responsibilityShall be familiar with applicable statutory requirements, laws, rules and regulationsShall at all times encourage to and seek improvement.Qualification:Bachelor Degree in Mechanical or Chemical Engineering or related fieldMin.3 years experiences in construction of Onshore/ Offshore Oil & Gas or related industryGood command in English both speaking and writingKnowledge:Knowledge of international Codes and Standard such as : ASME, API, NORSOK and other which related to mechanical and piping workKnowledge of Hydrostatic and Pneumatic testing workKnowledge of Chemical Cleaning and Hot oil Flushing workCompetence in MS office, Autodesk Navisworks and othersSend your resume with photo & expected salary in English to:Aibel (Thailand) Limited4 Moo 6, Sukhumvit Road, T.Banchang, A.Banchang, Rayong 21130Website :www.aibel.comWe offer attractive packages along with excellent career progression. Interested applicant kindly submit detailed resume by "Apply Now"

job_title: Field Service Engineer (Pharma equipment) - Work from home (for a while)/Nontaburi - Up to 80K
job_responsibilities: ['Position:         Field Service Engineer (Contract)Location:         * Work-from-Home for a while* and looking for Nonthaburi areaSalary Range:      Up to 80KWorking Hours:    Mon - Fri (9.00 - 17.00)Key Responsibilities:To provide technical support and servie to end users in Thailand and as the other countries (Vietnam, Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia, India etc, sometimes Europe, Russia)Provide support remotely regarding Lyophilizer machines to customers via phone calls, message, emails, as a contact window for customer service.diagnose machine problems and determine proper solutions to customer.Work directly with customers at their site to perform new Installation / commissioning/after sales service.Support and train customers on the product solutions that have been purchased.constantly communicate with customers to build positive relationshipsidentify and qualify products as per accepted customer order requirement.Create service reports with summaries/get the key point of customer’s new requirement/comments/suggestions on design / manufacturing / service to support continuous improvement.Primarily, the job scope focus on after-service and trouble-shooting to learn and build knowledge about products. Eventually, the career will grow into installation of the products.Training shall be provided at Techinal Center in China or IndiaKey ']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor\'s Degree in Pharmaceutical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Process Equipment, or Mechanical Engineering3+ years experience of service engineer from pharma equipment manufacturing company or pharma company\'s engineering teamExpected to have knowledge of some of the below equipments: lyophilizer, ampoule filling line, vital filling line, PFS (pre fill syringe), auto loading system, orabs/isolator,Auto visual Inspection and Leakage detection machine, etc Auto CADEnglish: fluent enough to discuss with international customersAble to travel internationally (mainly Vietnam, Indonesia, India, China, Malaysia, Singapore…etc)*Applications will be treated in strict confidence. All material submitted in connection with your application will become part of our confidential recruitment files.We regret that only shortlisted candidates will be notified. *Kelly Services Staffing & Recruitment (Thailand) Co., Ltd.(A PERSOLKELLY Company)27th Floor, Empire Tower 3, Unit 2707,1 South Sathorn Road, Yannawa, Sathorn, Bangkok 10120 | ThailandContact Person:Philaluk T. (Pla) / Consultantphilaluk_thanumas"@"kellyservices.co.thTel/Whatsapp: 0894424636 ']
job_description: Position:         Field Service Engineer (Contract)Location:         * Work-from-Home for a while* and looking for Nonthaburi areaSalary Range:      Up to 80KWorking Hours:    Mon - Fri (9.00 - 17.00)Key Responsibilities:To provide technical support and servie to end users in Thailand and as the other countries (Vietnam, Malaysia, Singapore, Indonesia, India etc, sometimes Europe, Russia)Provide support remotely regarding Lyophilizer machines to customers via phone calls, message, emails, as a contact window for customer service.diagnose machine problems and determine proper solutions to customer.Work directly with customers at their site to perform new Installation / commissioning/after sales service.Support and train customers on the product solutions that have been purchased.constantly communicate with customers to build positive relationshipsidentify and qualify products as per accepted customer order requirement.Create service reports with summaries/get the key point of customer’s new requirement/comments/suggestions on design / manufacturing / service to support continuous improvement.Primarily, the job scope focus on after-service and trouble-shooting to learn and build knowledge about products. Eventually, the career will grow into installation of the products.Training shall be provided at Techinal Center in China or IndiaKey Qualifications:Bachelor's Degree in Pharmaceutical Engineering, Chemical Engineering, Process Equipment, or Mechanical Engineering3+ years experience of service engineer from pharma equipment manufacturing company or pharma company's engineering teamExpected to have knowledge of some of the below equipments: lyophilizer, ampoule filling line, vital filling line, PFS (pre fill syringe), auto loading system, orabs/isolator,Auto visual Inspection and Leakage detection machine, etc Auto CADEnglish: fluent enough to discuss with international customersAble to travel internationally (mainly Vietnam, Indonesia, India, China, Malaysia, Singapore…etc)*Applications will be treated in strict confidence. หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบควบคุมการผลิตไฟฟ้าจากระบบSolar Cell และจัดทำรายงานประจำวัน ประจำเดือน (ประจำ 3 เดือน, ประจำ 6 เดือน, ประจำ 1 ปี)ควบคุมดำเนินการงานบำรุงรักษา ระบบ อุปกรณ์ ภายในโรงไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ให้พร้อมใช้งานตลอดเวลาวางแผนงานบำรุงรักษา และควบคุมงานให้ดำเนินการตามแผนงาน ในการบำรุงรักษาระบบ อุปกรณ์ ภายในโรงไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ ให้เป็นไปตามระเบียบดำเนินการของบริษัทฯ ตามมาตรฐานISO วิเคราะห์ปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้นกับระบบ อุปกรณ์ ภายในโรงไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ ทำการแก้ไข และทำการป้องกันการเกิดซ้ำประสานงานผู้รับเหมาช่วงในการดำเนินการตามกิจกรรม ที่บริษัทฯ ทำการว่าจ้าง และควบคุมการดำเนินการให้บรรลุผลดำเนินการตรวจวัดค่าพลังงานไฟฟ้า และคุณภาพไฟฟ้าของโรงงานพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ดำเนินการรวบรวมข้อมูลจากการดำเนินการงานO&M จัดทำรายงานสรุป เพื่อรายงานผู้ที่เกี่ยวข้องงานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติเพศชาย อายุ22 ปีขึ้นไป วุฒิอนุปริญญาหรือปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชาไฟฟ้ากำลังหรืออิเล็กทรอนิกส์ (ยินดีต้อนรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่)มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานO&M โรงงานไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ อย่างน้อย 1 ปีขึ้นไปมีความรู้ทางด้านงานก่อสร้าง ติดตั้งอุปกรณ์ โรงงานไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์สามารถใช้งานเครื่องมือวัดในการตรวจเช็คอุปกรณ์ต่างๆได้ เช่น กล้องถ่ายภาพความร้อนSolar I-V Tester, Ground Testerมีความรู้ด้านInstrument & Control PLC สามารถใช้งานคอมพิวเตอร์และโปรแกรมMS Office ได้เป็นอย่างดี

job_title: Maintenance Engineer / Senior Engineer (Electrical,Mechanical) /วิศวกรอาวุโส/วิศวกรซ่อมบำรุง (ไฟฟ้า,เครื่องกล)
job_description: ปฏิบัติงานกับบริษัท ยูนิเวอร์แซล ยูทีลิตี้ส์ จำกัด(มหาชน)หรือ UU ซึ่งเป็นบริษัทในเครือของบริษัท จัดการและพัฒนาทรัพยากรน้ำภาคตะวันออก จำกัด (มหาชน) หรือ East Water ตลอดเวลาที่ผ่านมา บริษัทฯประสบความสำเร็จในการบริหารกิจการประปาและบริหารระบบบำบัดน้ำเสีย อย่างมีคุณภาพนอกจากนี้บริษัท ยังคำนึงถึงการให้โอกาสที่เท่าเทียมกัน ของทุกคนในสังคม โดยเปิดโอกาสให้ผู้พิการสามารถสมัครงาน และเข้าสู่กระบวนการคัดเลือกได้ตามตำแหน่งงานที่เหมาะสมกับความสามารถอีกด้วยหน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบ :จัดการงานซ่อมบำรุงและบำรุงรักษา ในทุกๆกิจการประปา ให้ดำเนินการได้ตามแผนงานที่กำหนด และมีประสิทธิภาพจัดทำมาตรฐานงานซ่อมบำรุงเครื่องจักร และอุปกรณ์แต่ละประเภท ใช้สอดคล้องกับเงื่อนไขการใช้งานนำข้อมูลที่ได้จากการซ่อมบำรุง มาประเมินและวิเคราะห์ผลในเชิง สถิติ และ แนวโน้มจัดการวางแผนงานซ่อมบำรุงและบำรุงรักษา แต่ละกิจการประปาการจัดการเรื่อง Spare Part List ในระบบงานซ่อมบำรุงติดตามการควบคุมการใช้พลังงานคุณสมบัติ :จบการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี/ปริญญาโท วิศวกรรมศาสตร์ สาขาวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า, อิเล็กทรอนิกส์,   เครื่องกลไฟฟ้า หรือสาขาอื่นที่เกี่ยวข้องมีประสบการณ์เกี่ยวกับการปฏิบัติงานซ่อม และบำรุงรักษา งานระบบไฟฟ้าและเครื่องจักรกลการผลิตระบบน้ำ 1-5 ปีมีความรู้ที่เกี่ยวข้องกับกระบวนการผลิตน้ำประปา น้ำเสีย และอุปกรณ์ใช้งาน เช่น Motor, Pump, Pipe, Valve, VSD ฯลฯมีความรู้ที่เกี่ยวกับการใช้เครื่องมือวิเคราะห์ปัญหาประเภทต่างๆ ระบบไฟฟ้าขนาดใหญ่ และการจัดการพลังงานสามารถขับรถยนต์ได้ พร้อมมีใบอนุญาตขับขี่รถยนต์สถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน : สำนักงานใหญ่ อาคารอีสวอเตอร์ กรุงเทพฯ

Job Description:Test Production Engineering Support in Manufacturing: Ensure that hardware and KGU is well maintained, and all product test setup requirements are well documentedQuality & Yield Improvement: Initiate, drive and monitor Yield Improvement and QA PPM related projects, and ensure project completion in a timely mannerCycle Time ReductionInitiate, drive and monitor Single Pass Flow Evaluations and Test Time Reduction Projects and ensure project completion in a timely mannerInitiate & drive in releasing & monitoring of hold lots with HW/Interface issues in 2 days.Initiate, drive and monitor Cost Reduction projects and ensure project completion in a timely mannerWorkforce and Communication: Update and maintain the Project List and submit to Supervisors for evaluation with respect to prioritizationTraining: Ensure engineers are competent enough and are certified on certain qualificationsResponsibilities may include, but are not limited to:Bachelor Degrees in engineering, preferably Electronics and Communications Engineering or Electrical Engineering.At least 1-2 years of working experiencesGood knowledge on Basic Electronics, Engineering Practices and ProceduresKnowledgeable in Wafer and IC Package Level testing or expertise to one of these areasKnowledgeable in software programming and hardware architectureStrong written and verbal communication skillsGood command in EnglishAdvantageous but not required:Possesses good English communication skills, written and verbalThrives in a global, multi-functional team environmentSelf-motivated to plan, organize, and prioritize assigned activitiesExhibits good interpersonal skillsExperience with Teradyne microFlex, LTX, and/or ETS88Fresh graduates are welcome to applyBenefit:Working Hour: Monday – Friday 8:30 – 17:30Meal AllowanceTransportation AllowanceQuarter Bonus1-month Bonus fixed (End of year)Provident FundHealth InsuranceBus Transportation (if require)Employee Activities such as: New Year, Songkran etc.

Job Description:Collect, understand and analyze business processes, data interfaces process flows and business rules and translate into software functional specifications.Engage clients,understand business requirements and transform into software requirementsModel business processes and flows and configures into the MES and validates configured data with end usersInvolvement in software development (design, coding and testing) when needed.Processing of engineering change notices.When needed, manage a mid-sized project (1 to 3 months) or a subtask of a large project (> 3 months) in terms of tasks, resources, schedule and risk mitigation.Ensure that the company’s commitment on environmental management, health and safety is observed and performed.Be aware of the company’s quality and environmental policies.Responsibilities may include, but are not limited to:Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or Information TechnologyHas some knowledge in semiconductor manufacturing processes preferably in the areas of production control, manufacturing execution systems (MES) and MES process flow buildingExcellent documentation skills Ability to create SQL queries Software development experience is a plusBenefit:Working Hour: Monday – Friday 8:30 – 17:30Meal AllowanceTransportation AllowanceQuarter Bonus1-month Bonus fixed (End of year)Provident FundHealth InsuranceBus Transportation (if require)Employee Activities such as: New Year, Songkran etc.

Join ABB and work in a team that is dedicated to creating a future where innovative digital technologies allow greater access to cleaner energy.From rapid response and performance improvement to operational efficiency and life-cycle management, Service is one of our fastest-growing areas.ABB's Power Grids Transformers are a global leader in technology, and the largest supplier of transformers in the world. We are pioneering the digitalization of transformers, while working on the frontier of renewable energy and ultra-high voltage AC & DC applications.You will lead the Service organization for the Transformers Business Line in Thailand. Reporting to the South East Asia Service Manager, you will implement HUB Service strategy and drive local Service growth at the assigned region. You will also lead the local service organization and is responsible for the profit and loss to achieving both qualitative and quantitative targets and to optimize the utilization of service resources to ensure high levels of customer satisfaction. Your responsibilitiesRunning the day-to-day Service business to ensure profitable growth and improvement of Service productivity by implementing agreed-upon delivery and performance standards and ensuring consistency in quality and customer satisfaction. Driving the implementation of the service strategy, ensuring that corresponding plans are implemented consistently in the service organization through collaboration with other businesses/hub. Setting and monitoring progress toward performance targets – including financial, productivity, investments, customer satisfaction and operational excellence.Building sustainable customer relationships to ensure client growth, satisfaction and retention together with sales and utilizing customer feedback to drive consistent development of processes and practices. Investing in the improvement of existing Service product quality while suggesting developments in new service products to expand the portfolio in line with global directions.Implementing productized service offerings and materials for marketing purposes and driving service sales to increase market penetration.Driving operational excellence and continuous improvement of service delivery process, promoting sharing of experience and leading practices in service across the region.Guiding, motivating, coaching and developing the skills, knowledge and competencies of the service team.Living ABB’s core values of safety and integrity, which means taking responsibility for your own actions while caring for your colleagues and the business.Your backgroundA Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineer or Mechanical EngineerMore than 10 years of experience in transformer business, working as product sales and also solution-based provider is preferable.Entrepreneurial mindset to enable the organization and people to pursue and exceed target.Sound knowledge of and hands-on experience in servicing, maintaining, commissioning and repairing of Power Grids or Medium Voltage equipment.Proven leadership skills, with a collaborative, solutions-oriented approach and strong communication skills with proficient in EnglishCurrent driver’s license valid in ThailandAbility to travel to site location as domestic and abroad.More about usBring your very own sense of pride and purpose as you help us drive forward the Fourth Industrial Revolution – creating a sustainable future for our planet, and your career. Join ABB and harness the power of our diverse global network, as you collaborate with and learn from our world-class teams. Above all, challenge yourself every day. Let’s write the future, together.“It is an exciting time to join ABB Power Grids. ABB and Hitachi have signed an agreement to create a joint venture (JV). By combining ABB Power Grids’ with Hitachi’s complementary strengths, we plan to form a new and stronger global leader in the power sector. ABB Power Grids and Hitachi will have more than 230 years of combined heritage and experience. Together, we will be well-positioned to shape the future of energy, with pioneering technologies, as the partner of choice for enabling a stronger, smarter and greener grid.The transaction is expected to be completed by the first half of 2020, subject to regulatory approvals. Join us on this exciting journey.”Recruitment Agencies please be aware that this role is being managed by the internal ABB Talent team directly. We will reach out to our preferred agency partners should we require support. Your adherence to our process is appreciated.

job_title: Instrument Commissioning Technician (Oil Gas/control valves, pressure, temperature ) (6 positions)
job_description: External hire of Project Personnel –Position: Commissioning Instrument TechnicianScope of work:The commissioning instrument technician shall participate in preparation and execution of pre-commissioning and commissioning activities with the field instrumentation on the moduleWork tasks:• Attend MC verification of equipment and packages• Execute punch out of work in the field and document punches using Company Data system• Evaluate test equipment and tools needed before commissioning start• Carry out commissioning preparation checks for all system related equipment• Participate in multidiscipline commissioning according to commissioning procedures and Company safety standards• Responsible for mark up of relevant documents with changes identified during Commissioning• Ensure that the commissioning work is conducted in accordance with Commissioning Manual principles, procedures, schedules and a high technical quality to achieve a timely start-up, operational reliability and safety• Ensure safe commissioning with high focus on HSE by him/herself and all parties involved• Be proactive and take corrective actions as required• Ensure high focus on interfaces towards all involved parties and coordination at site• Identify deviations/non-conformities and handle these in accordance with project proceduresExperience/qualifications needed: • Technical preferably higher education or long experience in working with field instrumentation, operating and maintenance of Field Instrument equipment such as control valves, pressure, temperature, flow transmitters etc.• Ability to read and understand P&ID’s, wiring diagrams, logic diagrams etc.• Looptest experience• Knowledge of Distributed Control System, especially Kongsberg Maritime is an advantage• Experience with different communication protocols i.e HART, Modbus, Profibus, ProfNet, Pakscan etc.• Experience in commissioning phase of a project• Ne/He test experience is an advantage. • Familiarity with ProCoCys and STID is an advantage• Candidate must be solution oriented and be able to work independentlyFircroft Thailand22nd Floor, 2202 Pacific Place II Building, 142Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok,, Thailand 10110Contact K Chairat Chadavipoo02 653 2947 Ext 136                                    RMS 223614

prepare yield report to the core teamAbout YouCapable of communicating in a complex situation with the cross-function support teamAble to prioritize multiple tasks, manage conflicting deadlines and updateFluent in English communication both spoken and writtenEnergetic and PassionateYour Experience Includes:Technical and engineering background (manufacturing, operation and supplier heads, a crucial component of the read/write functionality of a hard disk drive. Get in a few laps around our running track or enjoy volleyball, ping pong, badminton or football through our on-site gymnasium and fitness center. We also offer music, dance and yoga activities. job_responsibilities: ['Duties:Setup and manage the safety laboratory for Battery Operated Toy and E&E products.To Lead the E&E and Calibration team for developing new capability and improvement of the existing tests to align with the regulation/specification or customer requirement. To interface with SGS networks and external organization for updating technical information.To manage lab resources and equipment ensuring the effective deployment and adequate resources in line with the volume of work and potential growth of business. Monitoring use and maintenance of the equipment and housekeeping in laboratory.Review the SOP and sample to ensure that they comply to test standards and client’s request. To ensure that the QA functions are fully implemented to comply with the ISO/IEC 17025 standard requirements.To support marketing activities, sales promotions, campaign or seminars.To provide technical training and technical information to Lab, Sales or CS/KAM team and customer on the expertise area.To investigate or internal audit for the case of complaint or NCR on the expertise area.To be responsible as “ Deputy Technical Manager” of Calibration Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To be responsible as “Technical Manager” of EE safety Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To have authorize to report, review and authorization of results for EE Safety Lab.At all times, comply with SGS Code of Integrity and Professional Conduct.Senior Technical Engineer is deputy when the above position was absent (for Calibration Lab).']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor Degree in Electrical/Electronic Engineering.Minimum 4 years experience in E&E laboratory.Experience in instrument or electrical field.Basic Quality System.ISO/IEC 17025 Requirements.E&E Product Safety testing.Technical Knowledge in metrological measurement.Communication and Writing in English. ']
job_description: Duties:Setup and manage the safety laboratory for Battery Operated Toy and E&E products.To Lead the E&E and Calibration team for developing new capability and improvement of the existing tests to align with the regulation/specification or customer requirement. To interface with SGS networks and external organization for updating technical information.To manage lab resources and equipment ensuring the effective deployment and adequate resources in line with the volume of work and potential growth of business. Monitoring use and maintenance of the equipment and housekeeping in laboratory.Review the SOP and sample to ensure that they comply to test standards and client’s request. To ensure that the QA functions are fully implemented to comply with the ISO/IEC 17025 standard requirements.To support marketing activities, sales promotions, campaign or seminars.To provide technical training and technical information to Lab, Sales or CS/KAM team and customer on the expertise area.To investigate or internal audit for the case of complaint or NCR on the expertise area.To be responsible as “ Deputy Technical Manager” of Calibration Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To be responsible as “Technical Manager” of EE safety Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To have authorize to report, review and authorization of results for EE Safety Lab.At all times, comply with SGS Code of Integrity and Professional Conduct.Senior Technical Engineer is deputy when the above position was absent (for Calibration Lab).Qualifications:Bachelor Degree in Electrical/Electronic Engineering.Minimum 4 years experience in E&E laboratory.Experience in instrument or electrical field.Basic Quality System.ISO/IEC 17025 Requirements.E&E Product Safety testing.Technical Knowledge in metrological measurement.Communication and Writing in English.

An exciting SMT Manager (x1 vacancy) job has just become available at Electronic manufacturer based in Rayong, Thailand. This is a role for SMT Manager who thrive on challenging opportunity. About the SMT Manager (Surface Mount Technology) Role:You will be leading the team and play a vital role to deliver sound and effective process operation. The salary range for this role is THB 100k - 120k per month + benefits + massive bonus.Key Responsibilities:General assists in the production line of surface mount technologies, which involve attaching electronic materials to printed circuit boardsDevelop and implement advanced processes and SMT methodologiesPerform defect and failure analyses for Surface Mount Technology (SMT)Lead improvements in process yield, quality, cycle time, inventory accuracy and deliveryInspect various machinery, tools, and materials involved in the process to make sure that they are working properly.Lead a team of SMT Machine Operators and Process TechniciansReport direct to Plant ManagerTo succeed in the SMT Manager (Surface Mount Technology) job, you will need to have experiences on electronic industry with the ability to work effectively and co-operatively with the team.Key Requirements:Bachelor's or Master degree in EngineeringAt least 10 years in experience in electronic manufacturingStrong knowledge in SMT processSolid background in electronic businessMust have been working in MNC company with good understanding in international operationsMust have strong people management, leadership and presentation skillsGood command in English language This electronic company needs no introduction and is recognised as the leader in their field of expertise. The culture is demanding but if you are confident and have a can-do attitude the potential rewards are significant and there are great opportunities to progress in this dynamic company.If you are a driven and determined SMT Manager with proven track record of achievements in manufacturing environment, this is an excellent opportunity for you.Apply today for this exciting opportunity. mu Space’s Internship Program is designed forstudents who arepassionate about space, andseeking to gain their work experience in a space technology company. The program provides them with a valuable experience working with Product Development team. job_responsibilities: ['Salary:23,000 Baht/month plus housing allowance (For New Grad) / 35,000 - 45,000 Baht/month (for 3-5 years experience)Job Description:Control and instrumentation (C&I) engineers are responsible for designing, developing, installing, managing and maintaining equipment which is used to monitor and control engineering systems, machinery and processes Your job is to make sure that these systems and processes operate effectively, efficiently and safely.You might work for companies who manufacture and supply the equipment or for the companies who use it, such as nuclear and renewable energy companies and environmental agencies.You will need a thorough understanding of the operational processes of an organization as your role is multidisciplinary, working closely with colleagues across a number of functions, including operations, purchasing and design. Advanced process control (APC), Distributed control systems (DCS), programmable logic controllers (PLC), supervisory control and data acquisition (SCADA).testing, maintaining, modifying existing systems, managing operations and ensure data presenting findings in written reports.working collaboratively with design engineers, operation engineers, purchasers and other internal staffliaising with clients, suppliers, contractors and relevant authorities (e.g. the Nuclear Decommissioning Authority)project management within cost and time constrained environments.']

job_title: Service Technician ประจำอยุธยา
job_description: Work location: นิคมอุตสาหกรรมโรจนะWork day: จันทร์ – ศุกร์, 8.00 – 17.00 น.หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบบำรุงรักษาอุปกรณ์มาตรวัดของกรมสรรพสามิตตามแผนงานซ่อมแซมและแก้ไขอุปกรณ์มาตรวัดของกรมสรรพสามิต รวมทั้งรายงานผลใน Service Reportประสานงานกับหน่วยงานที่เกี่ยวข้องปฏิบัติงานอื่นๆตามที่ได้รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติสัญชาติไทย เพศชายเท่านั้น อายุ ไม่เกิน 30 ปีวุฒิ ปวส. สาขาการไฟฟ้า, อิเล็กทรอนิกส์ และมีประสบการณ์ 1-2 ปีึ้นไปวุฒิป.ตรี สาขาการไฟฟ้า, อิเล็กทรอนิกส์, เครื่องกล หรือสาขาอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้อง (ยินดีรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่)สามารถวิเคราะห์วงจรไฟฟ้าอิเลกทรอนิกส์ได้มีความรู้พื้นฐานในการใช้งาน PLCพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษหากมีประสบการณ์เกี่ยวกับระบบ PLC (Omron)พิจารณาเป็นพิเศษหากมีประสบการณ์เกี่ยวกับระบบ Machine Vision (Omron, Dalsa)มีใบขับขี่รถยนต์ สามารถขับรถเกียร์ธรรมดาได้สามารถไปปฏิบัติงานนอกสถานที่ในจังหวัด นนทบุรี ปทุมธานี นครปฐม อยุธยา ฉะเชิงเทรา สระบุรีสามารถทำงานเป็นทีมได้ดีFor interested candidate, please submit your updated CV with full details of working experience, stating present and expected salary together with recent photo by click"Apply Now"All applications would be treated with the strictest confidentiality.Chanwanich GroupSilom (Head office):Kongboonma Building, 699 Silom Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500Phrapradaeng:Suksawad Rd., Pakklong Bang pla kot, Phrasamutchedi, SamutprakarnSinsakhon:Sinsakhon Printing City & Industrial Estate, SamutsakhonTel. 081-912-0420(K.Apinya)www.chanwanich.tech|www.witsco.biz|www.chanwanich.comFind us on Line application:“@chanwanich”

Responsibilities:To be the technical owner for the test program.To drive and deliver all aspects of test improvement as quickly as possible, including test cost reduction, test coverage improvement, test integral yield improvement, test flexibility improvement, test platform transfer, test efficiency improvement (RRR, R&R, and SOTF), TDP simplification, etc.Able to use the bench application to write a functional test and convert into ATE test.To support root cause finding for customer return on ATE.To understand the device behavior and functionality to be able to efficiently deliver the first solution or carry out necessary improvements.Able to use the teamwork environment (e.g. CVS, SVN, Collabnet) for test program development.Giving technical solution and being technical consultant for the team.Lead meeting, conduct teleconference meeting and contract both external and internal team to get the agreement/solution on problem/design.Generate product test specification, running product test cases and generate product test report.Requirements:Bachelor's degree or master's degree in Electrical & Electronic Engineering.Experience or special skillsExperience in Test/Product engineer is an advance.Good in English communication.Be tactful and diplomatic to maintain a good working relationship with Business lineis an advance.Good technical skill in C++ (SPEA), Linux (LTXC), VB/VBA/VBT (TeradyneJ750, Flex, u-Flex).สวัสดิการพนักงาน:เงินโบนัสประจำปีเงินตอบแทนพิเศษตามผลประกอบการของบริษัทฯปรับเงินขึ้นค่าจ้างเงินเดือนประจำปีประกันสังคม / ประกันสุขภาพกลุ่มสวัสดิการรักษาพยาบาลของครอบครัวพนักงานสวัสดิการด้านทันตกรรมวันหยุดพักผ่อนประจำปี 12 – 20 วันตรวจสุขภาพประจำปีเงินช่วยเหลืออุปสมบทเงินช่วยเหลือการสมรสเงินช่วยเหลือการคลอดบุตรเงินช่วยเหลือเนื่องจากมรณกรรมกองทุนบำเหน็จสำหรับพนักงานรางวัลทองคำตามอายุงานทุนการศึกษาสำหรับบุตรพนักงานสหกรณ์ออมทรัพย์การผ่อนชำระเงินกู้เพื่อที่อยู่อาศัยธนาคารอาคารสงเคราะห์ห้องสมุดห้องอาหารประจำบริษัทฯ ข้าว/น้ำดื่ม/น้ำแข็งฟรีห้องพักผ่อนห้องออกกำลังกายห้องพยาบาลกิจกรรมกีฬางานรื่นเริงประจำปีลาเพื่อการสมรสลาอุปสมบทลาคลอดบุตรThe successful candidates will be enrolled in a rigorous training program to provide them with the necessary skills in processing transactions in a highly computerized environment. They should be fast learners who can identify opportunities for processed and system improvements.Contact way :NXP Semiconductors303 Moo 3, Chaengwattana Rd., Laksi, Bangkok 10210Tel. 0-2797-5000Fax. 0-2797-5350Website :www.nxp.com

job_title: Sales Executive ประจำ LAB SGS(ส่วนงาน LAB เครื่องใช้ไฟฟ้า)
job_description: รายละเอียดงาน- ขายงานตรวจสอบสำหรับห้องLAB พระรามสาม และ LAB เครื่องใช้ไฟฟ้า - สามารถขับรถได้ มีรถเป็นของตัวเองคุณสมบัติผู้สมัคร1. เพศชาย/หญิง และ จบปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมศาสตร์ไฟฟ้า หรือ อิเลคทรอนิกส์ 2. มีประสบการณ์ในงานขาย อย่างน้อย 1 ปี3. ทำงานจันทร์ ถึง ศุกร์ เวลา 8.30 - 17.30 น.4. สามารถใช้โปรแกรมMS Office ได้เป็นอย่างดี5. ทำงานLAB SGS พระรามสาม ซอย 596. ขับรถได้ มีใบขับขี่ และ มีรถยนตร์เป็นของตนเอง

job_responsibilities: ["Fircroftis now enhancing their coverage to focus more on permanent Recruitment and Personnel Solution service. Now we're looking forSuperintendent - Construction,Electricalas detail below;Location: ChonburiCondition: ContractResponsibilitiesResponsible for managing all site construction activities and supervising field personnel as required to ensure adherence to international standards, agreed budget, schedule and construction sequence. Responsible for supervising construction activities of Subcontractor trades personnel related to a discipline.Maintains the highest quality standards while administering good construction safety practices with all on-site activities.Ensure that all company employees and contractors are adhering to the company Health, Safety, and Environmental excellence policy.Promote job site safety, encourages safe work practices and rectifies job site hazards immediately. job_responsibilities: ['Duties:Setup and manage the safety laboratory for Battery Operated Toy and E&E products.To Lead the E&E and Calibration team for developing new capability and improvement of the existing tests to align with the regulation/specification or customer requirement.To interface with SGS networks and external organization for updating technical information.To manage lab resources and equipment ensuring the effective deployment and adequate resources in line with the volume of work and potential growth of business. Monitoring use and maintenance of the equipment and housekeeping in laboratory. Review the SOP and sample to ensure that they comply to test standards and client’s request. To ensure that the QA functions are fully implemented to comply with the ISO/IEC 17025 standard requirements. To support marketing activities, sales promotions, campaign or seminars.To provide technical training and technical information to Lab, Sales or CS/KAM team and customer on the expertise area.To investigate or internal audit for the case of complaint or NCR on the expertise area.To be responsible as “ Deputy Technical Manager” of Calibration Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To be responsible as “Technical Manager” of EE safety Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To have authorize to report, review and authorization of results for EE Safety Lab.At all times, comply with SGS Code of Integrity and Professional Conduct.Senior Technical Engineer is deputy when the above position was absent (for Calibration Lab).']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor Degree in Electrical/Electronic Engineering.Minimum 4 years experience in E&E laboratory.Experience in instrument or electrical field.Basic Quality System.ISO/IEC 17025 Requirements.E&E Product Safety testing.Technical Knowledge in metrological measurement.Communication and Writing in English. ']
job_description: Duties:Setup and manage the safety laboratory for Battery Operated Toy and E&E products.To Lead the E&E and Calibration team for developing new capability and improvement of the existing tests to align with the regulation/specification or customer requirement.To interface with SGS networks and external organization for updating technical information.To manage lab resources and equipment ensuring the effective deployment and adequate resources in line with the volume of work and potential growth of business. Monitoring use and maintenance of the equipment and housekeeping in laboratory. Review the SOP and sample to ensure that they comply to test standards and client’s request. To ensure that the QA functions are fully implemented to comply with the ISO/IEC 17025 standard requirements. To support marketing activities, sales promotions, campaign or seminars.To provide technical training and technical information to Lab, Sales or CS/KAM team and customer on the expertise area.To investigate or internal audit for the case of complaint or NCR on the expertise area.To be responsible as “ Deputy Technical Manager” of Calibration Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To be responsible as “Technical Manager” of EE safety Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To have authorize to report, review and authorization of results for EE Safety Lab.At all times, comply with SGS Code of Integrity and Professional Conduct.Senior Technical Engineer is deputy when the above position was absent (for Calibration Lab).Qualifications:Bachelor Degree in Electrical/Electronic Engineering.Minimum 4 years experience in E&E laboratory.Experience in instrument or electrical field.Basic Quality System.ISO/IEC 17025 Requirements.E&E Product Safety testing.Technical Knowledge in metrological measurement.Communication and Writing in English.

job_description: Creative Lighting Asia GroupEstablished in 2003, Creative Lighting Asia (CLA) is a specialist, project-based, lighting solutions provider with representative offices in Asian Countries (Hong Kong, Macau, China, Malaysia, Philippines, Singapore, India, Sri Lanka, Indonesia and Thailand). สถานที่ทำงาน: ศรีราชา, ชลบุรีงานที่รับผิดชอบรับผิดชอบในการกลั่นน้ำมันปิโตรเลียมและผลิตผลิตภัณฑ์ปิโตรเคมี เพื่อให้การผลิตเป็นไปตามแผน ได้มาตรฐานและตรงกับความต้องการของลูกค้า โดยร่วมวางแผนการปฏิบัติงานและกำกับดูแลอุปกรณ์การกลั่น/การผลิตให้อยู่ในสภาพที่ดี รวมถึง ซ่อมแซมอุปกรณ์พื้นฐานเท่าที่จำเป็น (minor maintenance) เพื่อให้อุปกรณ์ใช้งานได้และไม่เกิดผลกระทบต่อกระบวนการผลิตวุฒิการศึกษาที่ต้องการปวส.ขึ้นไป สาขาปิโตรเทคโนโลยี ปิโตรเคมี ไฟฟ้า อิเล็กทรอนิกส์ เครื่องมือวัด วัดคุม เมคคาทรอนิกส์ เครื่องกล เครื่องยนต์ หรือสาขาอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้องประสบการณ์ทำงานหากมีประสบการณ์การทำงานในโรงงาน หรือ โรงงานปิโตรเคมี จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษหากสนใจที่จะก้าวหน้าไปพร้อมกับเราเครือไทยออยล์ โปรดกรอกใบสมัคร พร้อมแนบรูปถ่าย ประวัติส่วนตัว (Resume) สำเนาใบสำเร็จการศึกษา (Transcript), สำเนาบัตรประชาชน, สำเนาทะเบียนบ้าน, เอกสารผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหาร และเอกสารอื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้องApply online :www.thaioilgroup.com or click "Apply Now"Contact :Recruitment TeamThaioil Energy Services Company Limited163/19 Moo 7 Tung- Sukla, Sriracha, Chonburi 20230Tel: 038-359-040, 038-408500 Ext. 19821-19828Fax: 038-359-018Website:www.thaioilgroup.com

job_responsibilities: ['Duties:Setup and manage the safety laboratory for Battery Operated Toy and E&E products.To Lead the E&E and Calibration team for developing new capability and improvement of the existing tests to align with the regulation/specification or customer requirement. To interface with SGS networks and external organization for updating technical information.To manage lab resources and equipment ensuring the effective deployment and adequate resources in line with the volume of work and potential growth of business. Monitoring use and maintenance of the equipment and housekeeping in laboratory.Review the SOP and sample to ensure that they comply to test standards and client’s request. To ensure that the QA functions are fully implemented to comply with the ISO/IEC 17025 standard requirements.To support marketing activities, sales promotions, campaign or seminars.To provide technical training and technical information to Lab, Sales or CS/KAM team and customer on the expertise area.To investigate or internal audit for the case of complaint or NCR on the expertise area.To be responsible as “ Deputy Technical Manager” of Calibration Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To be responsible as “Technical Manager” of EE safety Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To have authorize to report, review and authorization of results for EE Safety Lab.At all times, comply with SGS Code of Integrity and Professional Conduct.Senior Technical Engineer is deputy when the above position was absent (for Calibration Lab).']
job_qualifications: ['s:Bachelor Degree in Electrical/Electronic Engineering.Minimum 4 years experience in E&E laboratory.Experience in instrument or electrical field.Basic Quality System.ISO/IEC 17025 Requirements.E&E Product Safety testing.Technical Knowledge in metrological measurement.Communication and Writing in English. ']
job_description: Duties:Setup and manage the safety laboratory for Battery Operated Toy and E&E products.To Lead the E&E and Calibration team for developing new capability and improvement of the existing tests to align with the regulation/specification or customer requirement. To interface with SGS networks and external organization for updating technical information.To manage lab resources and equipment ensuring the effective deployment and adequate resources in line with the volume of work and potential growth of business. Monitoring use and maintenance of the equipment and housekeeping in laboratory.Review the SOP and sample to ensure that they comply to test standards and client’s request. To ensure that the QA functions are fully implemented to comply with the ISO/IEC 17025 standard requirements.To support marketing activities, sales promotions, campaign or seminars.To provide technical training and technical information to Lab, Sales or CS/KAM team and customer on the expertise area.To investigate or internal audit for the case of complaint or NCR on the expertise area.To be responsible as “ Deputy Technical Manager” of Calibration Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To be responsible as “Technical Manager” of EE safety Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To have authorize to report, review and authorization of results for EE Safety Lab.At all times, comply with SGS Code of Integrity and Professional Conduct.Senior Technical Engineer is deputy when the above position was absent (for Calibration Lab).Qualifications:Bachelor Degree in Electrical/Electronic Engineering.Minimum 4 years experience in E&E laboratory.Experience in instrument or electrical field.Basic Quality System.ISO/IEC 17025 Requirements.E&E Product Safety testing.Technical Knowledge in metrological measurement.Communication and Writing in English.

Title: Electrical and Robot Service ManagerService Manager - Robots - Electrical Devices - Based in Bangkok - Up to 100KThe ClientAn International Electrical Equipment CompanyThe RoleSupervise the Electrical CoordinatorGrow electrical service account base, through business development activityDevelop scopes of work, estimates, and proposals for small projects.Maintain open and positive communication (both in verbal and written form) with employees, departments, electricians, customers and vendorsMaintain appropriate staffing level and workload distribution to meet customer and business needsEnsure compliance with company policies and recommend policy changes as neededResponsible for the efficient operation of the Service Department and expense controlProactive and reactive management of all service personnel including hiring, training, motivation, career development, reviews and safetyOrganize and present at weekly tech meetings and safety trainingAssist with annual merit reviews and development planning for service personnelAnalyze service productivity and recommend changes to improve customer service and profitabilityMaintain high-quality service delivery in an efficient, productive and profitable mannerAssist technicians on installations and accounts to ensure excellent work qualityThe PersonMale/FemaleAround 40 years of age.Bachelor's degree in Engineering (Electrical, Electronic) or related fields.At least 6 years' experience in Project Management, Service Management or in related fields.Good command of written and spoken EnglishIf you are interested, please submit your profile via jobs DB or call 083-0092661Argyll Scott Asia is acting as an Employment Agency in relation to this vacancy.

job_responsibilities: ['General Description of Duties and Responsibilities:Manage and supervise the day-to-day operations and maintenance of mechanical and electrical equipment in the Data center.Identify risks and perform IDC vendor operation and maintenance quality assessment.As a technical professional for all facilities-related issues within the Data center of Thailand , escalating to the headquarter（HQ）technical team as neededPerform RCA(root cause analysis) of critical equipment failuresTroubleshoot and report of facility and Data sever-level events within internal SLACreate and deploy new standard practices for technicians and IDC vendor support teamsProvide training and guidance to operation team, such as Method of Procedure（MOP）, Standard Operating Procedure（SOP）, Emergency Operating Procedure（EOP）Ensure all EHS procedures are adhered to by vendor and Huawei staffCommunicate complex technical information to a non-technical audience.Candidate Requirement:Basic Qualifications：3+ years of relevant work experience in a data center or other critical environment or 5+ years of technical training or experience with relevant data center facilities equipmentBachelors or above in applicable engineering field or mechanical or electricalPreferred ']

job_description: General Description of Duties and Responsibilities:Manage and supervise the day-to-day operations and maintenance of mechanical and electrical equipment in the Data center.Identify risks and perform IDC vendor operation and maintenance quality assessment.As a technical professional for all facilities-related issues within the Data center of Thailand , escalating to the headquarter（HQ）technical team as neededPerform RCA(root cause analysis) of critical equipment failuresTroubleshoot and report of facility and Data sever-level events within internal SLACreate and deploy new standard practices for technicians and IDC vendor support teamsProvide training and guidance to operation team, such as Method of Procedure（MOP）, Standard Operating Procedure（SOP）, Emergency Operating Procedure（EOP）Ensure all EHS procedures are adhered to by vendor and Huawei staffCommunicate complex technical information to a non-technical audience.Candidate Requirement:Basic Qualifications：3+ years of relevant work experience in a data center or other critical environment or 5+ years of technical training or experience with relevant data center facilities equipmentBachelors or above in applicable engineering field or mechanical or electricalPreferred Qualifications： Electrical or mechanical License of ThailandStrong verbal and written communication skillsSolid leadership and organizational skillsProven self-starterAbility to prioritize in a complex, fast-paced environmentBase in Thailand, can short-term travel to other country when needed.Language:Good Speaking and Writing in both English, Thai, preferred Chinese (mandarin).Benefits:Dental insuranceFive-day work weekMedical insuranceOvertime payPerformance bonusHuawei Technologies (Thailand) Co., Ltd.38th Floor, No.9, G Tower Grand Rama 9,Rama 9 Road, Huaykwang Sub-district, Huaykwang District,Bangkok Metropolis, 10310 Thailand.Tel : 02-095-8199 Fax: 02-095-8000

job_description: Job DescriptionsProvide Electrical and Instrument technical as consultant for Maintenance and Operations.Provide Electrical and Instrument technical design to support new projects or reliability and ensure to comply with specification and codes to avoid further damage and plant shutdown. Execute project which include identify project scope cost estimate, obtain budget approval, budget control, detail design, quality control, schedule control. Coordinate all aspects of Maintenance, Reliability, and Engineering project in central support to ensure all Electrical and Instrument technical are combined and proper as requirement and coordinate with I/E outsource on special assignment.Participate effectively with team member through construction completion and turn over to the asset owner.Coordination the new asset records and account closing after project completion.Prepare new equipment requisitions for new Electrical and Instrument equipment for Project and Maintenance and continue proceeding to order, get delivery, installation, start-up, and handover with a good quality of work and safely.Work as a HAZOP team member in portion of Electrical and Instrument.Review construction safety and coordinate with concern parties to ensure safe, smooth and successful in construction of the project and maintenance Responsible in modification control and record per Management of Change (MOC) Procedure.Investigate failure of electrical and instrumentation, maintain and monitor I/E maintenance records including review and update PM/PdM program in CMMS. Be the focal point of I/E change request ,monitor and report electrical and instrumentation KPI.Be the electrical authorize person for 115/22kV switching.QualificationsBachelor Degree in Electrical, Instrument Engineering or related fieldMinimum 3 years of experience in Electrical and Instrument EngineerKnowledge in related international codes & standard specification.Experience in predictive and preventive maintenance in Chemical, Petrochemical or Refinery would be advantage.Experience in maintenance concepts, RCM/TPM and six sigma techniques.Well experienced in using and maintaining CCMS systems.Able to work with international vendor located outside Thailand for the sourcing of parts.Shown to have excellent social skills, be able to build bridges between disciplines, especially between maintenance and the various support departments Proficient in English both spoken and writtenAble to work in Asia Industrial Estate, Ban Chang, Rayong.

job_responsibilities: ["WE ONLY ACCEPT ONLINE APPLICATIONS IN OUR WEBSITEProcter & Gamble is the largest consumer goods company in the world. You will be allowed to do meaningful work with important responsibilities from Day 1, build and develop your expertise in one of the best organizations in the world, and benefit from tools and resources that help you enable our people and organizations to perform at their peak. You will join a global community of hardworking and motivated co-workers who are among the world’s best at what they do, and you will get to connect our people to P&G’s Purpose, so they can touch and improve more lives and deliver stronger, more effective business results.Overview of the jobDo you want to transform materials for winning consumer experiences?Engineer in our Bangkok plant might be the right place for you to gain this experience.In our Manufacturing department, we produce consumer goods to supply our customers with high-quality product, on-time, and at a low cost. You will help us innovate to ensure the development and use of the most advanced technologies. We value your creativity and skill in analyzing and solving problems.Your teamThis role reports to a Senior Engineer (Manager).How success looks likeOur assignments offer you the opportunity to make an immediate impact on the business, while you continue to build your analytical, technical and leadership skills. You will work as the engineer leader on a team with representatives from various other functions. You will play a role in setting strategy, decision-making, business planning, and analysis across all aspects of the business.Your success would be based on operational and project work you're doing, which would be reviewed on a quarterly basis. Your manager would provide full-support through continuous mentoring and coaching."]
