job_responsibilities: [' Responsibility:Managing quality level to ensure supplier delivers quality components and assemblies as the main function and have expanded responsibility to fulfill the area of SQE.Leading and managing all quality issues and performance under Electrical, HGSA (Head Gimbal Stack Assembly), and Indirect Material supplier commodity in the factory as Factory SQE (Supplier Quality Engineering).Driving the long term activity and improvement to support SQE (Supplier Quality Engineering) strategy to achieve industry 4.0 milestone.Managing product and process improvements to provide more product margin/stabilization.Providing new supplier location survey activity support, working with the operations team, and field SQE to ensure that qualification have achieved a timeline with a smooth transition.Working closely with the Factory and Field SQE team to upstream detection and protecting our customer through Big Data AnalysisProviding technical/physical support for customer audits at the factory in the area of electrical component, HGSA (Head Gimbal Stack Assembly), and indirect material related.Preparing weekly, monthly, and quarterly status reports on supplier-related and escalating to upper-quality management on potential quality issues and impact.']
job_qualifications: [': Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, Science, or other related.Fluent in English communication both spoken and written.Has Strong technical and engineering background.Has solid knowledge in the Hard Disk Drive industry.Understanding in process development and the Quality Management System.Excellent teamwork, leadership, organization, and presentation skills. ']
job_description: Responsibility:Managing quality level to ensure supplier delivers quality components and assemblies as the main function and have expanded responsibility to fulfill the area of SQE.Leading and managing all quality issues and performance under Electrical, HGSA (Head Gimbal Stack Assembly), and Indirect Material supplier commodity in the factory as Factory SQE (Supplier Quality Engineering).Driving the long term activity and improvement to support SQE (Supplier Quality Engineering) strategy to achieve industry 4.0 milestone.Managing product and process improvements to provide more product margin/stabilization.Providing new supplier location survey activity support, working with the operations team, and field SQE to ensure that qualification have achieved a timeline with a smooth transition.Working closely with the Factory and Field SQE team to upstream detection and protecting our customer through Big Data AnalysisProviding technical/physical support for customer audits at the factory in the area of electrical component, HGSA (Head Gimbal Stack Assembly), and indirect material related.Preparing weekly, monthly, and quarterly status reports on supplier-related and escalating to upper-quality management on potential quality issues and impact.Qualification: Bachelor’s Degree in Engineering, Science, or other related.Fluent in English communication both spoken and written.Has Strong technical and engineering background.Has solid knowledge in the Hard Disk Drive industry.Understanding in process development and the Quality Management System.Excellent teamwork, leadership, organization, and presentation skills.

Responsibilities of position:Compliance with company goals and objectivesProcessing of production orders according to costs, quality, and deadlinesRun maintenance activities of spare parts control, preventive maintenance, break down maintenance, continuous improvement, projects and documentationHighlighting improvements to the processes and assisting with implementationMaintain good working places in clean and tidySustaining the processes within the groupIf errors or deviations are noticed, the superior is to be informed immediatelyOther activities as superior assignmentMain duties:Monitor related issues of assembly/machining lines. Plan, test and coordinate the implementation of preventive actions in the production lines in order to establish and verify capable and stable production processes in terms of safety, quality, delivery and cost.Troubleshoot PLC controls with electrical components, servo-drives, motors, wiring and panels.Lead, coordinate and facilitate trouble shooting electrical issues, and issue resolutions as they relate to equipment downtime, throughput improvement or safety concerns. Establish, maintain, update and administer electrical control plans. Participate in all aspects of simultaneous engineering efforts to improve current processes and new projects. Provide technical support to production and maintenance organizations throughout the plant to evaluate and resolve maintenance problemsPerform any related tasks as neededRequirements:Degree of Engineering in Electrical, Electronics, Mechatronics with minimum 2-3 years working experiencesMaintenance experience (over 2 years with highly automated production systems is preferred)Knowledge with programmable logic controllers and robot controllersWork experience in the automotive supply industryComputer skills with SAP, Excel, Word, OutlookGood English communication skills in reading, writing and speakingThis job description enters into force on the day it is signed. It reflects the current status. The superior reserves the right to adapt the position to the changing circumstances.

As a Test Engineer, you'll need to thoroughly check materials, procedures and mechanical or electrical systems to ensure that customers get high-quality, functional products. They run tests on various components and features in order to identify and fix technical issues.Client DetailsOur client is an international semiconductor engineering company, provides semiconductor OEMs and associated technology and electronics manufacturers.DescriptionDesign test plans, procedures, scenarios, and scripts to accurately assess new products or software updates according to customer requirements and company policiesDevelop testing protocol for various aspects, such as usability, database impact, error and bug finding, regression testing, and implementation scenariosIdentify, analyse and create detailed records of problems that appear during testing, such as software defects, bugs, functionality issues, and output errors, and work directly with software developers to find solutions and develop retesting proceduresTrack problems, resolutions, and bug fixes throughout testing and create a comprehensive database of defects and successful mitigation techniquesCreate detailed, step-by-step documentation of test procedures for each phase or project as needed to ensure replicability, compliance with standards, and growth of company knowledge baseProfileBachelor's Degree in Mechanical / Electrical / Electronics Engineering or any related fieldsMust have at least 3 years' experience in ATE platform and Test Engineering for Semiconductors industryWell - versed in Test platform (LTX and MX) is a mustGood command of both spoken and written and EnglishJob OfferExcellent and competitive package, including fringe benefits & welfare, depending on experienceTo apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Kornkanok Tiyakhun on +66 2 012 5056

job_qualifications: ["s:Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, IT or related fields.Thai Nationality.Must be interested in database and storage technologiesMust be able to read and write in EnglishShould have some basic knowledge in database design, data structure, and file systems. It is expected that person in this position understands database normalization, data types, indexes, materialized/indexed views, and other objects in modern RDBMS or at the least willing to learn.Should be willing to experiment, with discretion.Basic knowledge in enterprise storage is a plus.Basic knowledge in enterprise backup is a plus.Basic knowledge of JDBC and Hibernate framework is a plus.Job DescriptionReview backup reports of all backup activities in the organization. If available, review the backup and/or archival results of customer’s backup schedule.Configure the backup for databases, applications, and servers deployed at customers’ sites.Monitor system performance, giving recommendations, and implement improvements to the storage and databases to enhance system response time and bandwidth.Guide and train software engineers and system analysts on the best practices of high-performance database design "]
job_description: Qualifications:Bachelor's Degree or higher in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, IT or related fields.Thai Nationality.Must be interested in database and storage technologiesMust be able to read and write in EnglishShould have some basic knowledge in database design, data structure, and file systems. It is expected that person in this position understands database normalization, data types, indexes, materialized/indexed views, and other objects in modern RDBMS or at the least willing to learn.Should be willing to experiment, with discretion.Basic knowledge in enterprise storage is a plus.Basic knowledge in enterprise backup is a plus.Basic knowledge of JDBC and Hibernate framework is a plus.Job DescriptionReview backup reports of all backup activities in the organization. If available, review the backup and/or archival results of customer’s backup schedule.Configure the backup for databases, applications, and servers deployed at customers’ sites.Monitor system performance, giving recommendations, and implement improvements to the storage and databases to enhance system response time and bandwidth.Guide and train software engineers and system analysts on the best practices of high-performance database design

job_responsibilities: ["Location : BangkokJob summary :-Providing business and technical solutions to customer needs. Major responsibility on HVAC installation system. Expert on project Management and cost control. They have to work with TRANE existing staff to continue contracting business. Responsible for customer satisfaction and loyalty while working in conjunction with operations partners. Builds and manages term customer relationships/partnerships with assigned accounts.HVAC control systems engineers work exclusively on a building's heating, cooling, ventilation, and refrigeration control systems. HVAC control systems are usually computerized and networked throughout a facility into a central command point. The HVAC control systems engineer designs, implements, modifies and maintains the control system. What's the role?This is an exciting role for a bright professional experienced in operations management to work closely with Regional Head of After Market Services and General Manager of Thailand to deliver value by streamlining tool services operations in Thailand. Hilti offers excellent opportunities to grow and encourage cross functional and cross country moves to support career progression of right candidates.Who is Hilti?If you’re new to the industry, you might not have heard of us. We provide leading-edge tools, technologies, software and services for the global construction sector. We have a proud heritage, built over 75 years, and a worldwide reputation for pioneering products and exceptional service.With 30,000 people in more than 120 countries, which we’re looking to expand, we’re a great place for you to show us your worth, step up to new challenges and grow your career.What does the role involve?Implementtool service strategybased on regional roadmap, as a change agent for the Tool Service Center & respective Market OrganizationsResponsible for day to day operations in repair centers , leading a team of operations manager and techniciansDeliver sustainableproductivityat defined end to endservice levelsAccountable to prepare and deliverRFbased on capacity/capabilities needsDrive & communicate a competitive tool servicedifferentiationand fair repair pricing to build a strong value for money awareness to support tool sales growthAccountable for sustainable implementation ofprocesses and repair standardsand respective modifications in repair center / tool service centerAccountable forlean cultureinTool Service Center and drive bottom up continuous improvement mindset to achieve operational excellenceAccountable for execution oflegal, compliance, ICS and HSE standardsin Tool Service centerResponsible for definition and execution ofcontingency & crisis plan Accountable for people andcompetencedevelopment Establish strongcollaborationwithin the Service Area leadership team to build a community of high performing teamImplement themanagement processto align with the Market Organization StakeholdersWhat do we offer?Show us what you’re made of and we’ll offer you opportunities to move around the business – to work abroad, experience different job functions and tackle different markets. It’s a great way to find the right match for your ambitions and achieve the exciting career you’re after.We have a very thorough people review process, unlike any we know of in any other business. We screen everyone in the company in a yearly career performance matching process. It means we can pair talent with opportunities - developing our people in their current roles or challenging them to work in new ways or in new places. It’s how we find the right fit and further our teams personally and professionally.Additionally, we offer you a competitive salary and a wide range of benefits, including training opportunities and very good health care plan.Why should you apply?We have an excellent mix of people, which we believe makes for a more vibrant, more innovative, more productive team. Success at Hilti is down to teamwork and ability, no matter what your background. If you have two or more years’ experience in engineering or construction, it’ll be a big advantage.What you need is:Degree of Engineering qualification Bilingual with fluency in Thai and English is a must Operations management experience of 6 years plus with organizations of repute in Automobiles / Services / ManufacturingGood Analytical skills Good stakeholder management skills If we’re impressed with your CV, we’ll invite you for an interview, introduce you to the team and pay for your travel to get there.Do you have any questions? Please contact recruitment team, Hilti (Thailand) Ltd.Tempted to apply or find out more? Go tohttps://careers.hilti.co.th/en-th

job_title: หัวหน้าแผนกซ่อมบำรุง (ประจำโรงงาน SCC สินสาคร)
job_description: หัวหน้างานโดยตรง :Factory Managerสถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน :นิคมสินสาครวันเวลาทำงานปกติ :ช่วงทดลองงาน ทำงานวันจันทร์ - เสาร์ เวลา8.00-17.00 น.หลังผ่านทดลองงาน ทำงานวันจันทร์ - ศุกร์ และวันเสาร์ (เดือนละ1-2 เสาร์) เวลา8.00-17.00 น.ความรับผิดชอบ :ควบคุมดูแลบำรุงรักษาเครื่องจักรให้มีประสิทธิภาพเพื่อสามารถผลิตสินค้าได้คุณภาพตามมาตรฐานและได้ปริมาณตามเป้าหมายของตารางการผลิตตรวจสอบความพร้อมและความเรียบร้อยของเครื่องจักรให้พร้อมสำหรับการผลิตประจำวันกำหนดการควบคุมดูแลการจัดเก็บ และเบิกจ่าย Spare part ต่างๆของเครื่องจักรที่เกี่ยวข้องในการผลิตค้นหาสาเหตุ วิเคราะห์ และรายงานแนวทางการแก้ไขแก่ผู้บังคับบัญชาเมื่อเกิดปัญหาของในสายการผลิต และให้คำแนะนำเกี่ยวกับระบบการปฏิบัติงานและปัญหาที่เกี่ยวกับงานเฉพาะเรื่องแก่พนักงานตามความเหมาะสมรับผิดชอบระบบสาธารณูปโภคภายในโรงงานคุณสมบัติ:เพศชาย สัญชาติไทย อายุ 30-40 ปีวุฒิการศึกษา ปริญญาตรี สาขาเครื่องกล ไฟฟ้า หรืออื่นๆที่เกี่ยวข้องประสบการณ์ในการซ่อมบำรุงรักษาเครื่องจักร และระบบสาธารณูปโภค อย่างน้อย 5 ปีขึ้นไป และมีประสบการณ์หัวหน้างานอย่างน้อย 1-2 ปีสามารถใช้ คอมพิวเตอร์ Microsoft Office ต่างๆและสามารถใช้ Auto CAD ได้สามารถอ่านแบบชิ้นส่วนเครื่องกลหรือแบบไฟฟ้ามีความรู้เรื่องงานซ่อมสร้างพอสมควรมีความรู้ด้านการบำรุงรักษาเครื่องจักรถ้ามีประสบการณ์ในงานธุรกิจสิ่งพิมพ์และบรรจุภัณฑ์ชนิดอ่อน Flexible Packagingจะพิจารณาเป็นกรณีพิเศษมีภาวะผู้นำสูง สามารถบริหารทีมได้ (ลูกน้อง 4 คน) มีทักษะในการให้คำปรึกษาFor interested candidate, please submit your updated CV with full details of working experience, stating present and expected salary together with recent photo by click"Apply Now"All applications would be treated with the strictest confidentiality.Chanwanich GroupSilom (Head office):Kongboonma Building, 699 Silom Road, Bangrak, Bangkok 10500Phrapradaeng :Suksawad Rd., Pakklong Bang pla kot, Phrasamutchedi, SamutprakarnSinsakhon :Sinsakhon Printing City & Industrial Estate, SamutsakhonFind us on Line application :“@chanwanich”

To interface with SGS networks and external organization for updating technical information.To manage lab resources and equipment ensuring the effective deployment and adequate resources in line with the volume of work and potential growth of business. To ensure that the QA functions are fully implemented to comply with the ISO/IEC 17025 standard requirements.To support marketing activities, sales promotions, campaign or seminars.To provide technical training and technical information to Lab, Sales or CS/KAM team and customer on the expertise area.To investigate or internal audit for the case of complaint or NCR on the expertise area.To be responsible as “ Deputy Technical Manager” of Calibration Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To be responsible as “Technical Manager” of EE safety Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To have authorize to report, review and authorization of results for EE Safety Lab.At all times, comply with SGS Code of Integrity and Professional Conduct.Senior Technical Engineer is deputy when the above position was absent (for Calibration Lab).']

']
job_description: Duties:Setup and manage the safety laboratory for Battery Operated Toy and E&E products.To Lead the E&E and Calibration team for developing new capability and improvement of the existing tests to align with the regulation/specification or customer requirement. To interface with SGS networks and external organization for updating technical information.To manage lab resources and equipment ensuring the effective deployment and adequate resources in line with the volume of work and potential growth of business. Monitoring use and maintenance of the equipment and housekeeping in laboratory.Review the SOP and sample to ensure that they comply to test standards and client’s request. To ensure that the QA functions are fully implemented to comply with the ISO/IEC 17025 standard requirements.To support marketing activities, sales promotions, campaign or seminars.To provide technical training and technical information to Lab, Sales or CS/KAM team and customer on the expertise area.To investigate or internal audit for the case of complaint or NCR on the expertise area.To be responsible as “ Deputy Technical Manager” of Calibration Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To be responsible as “Technical Manager” of EE safety Laboratory as defined by ISO/IEC 17025.To have authorize to report, review and authorization of results for EE Safety Lab.At all times, comply with SGS Code of Integrity and Professional Conduct.Senior Technical Engineer is deputy when the above position was absent (for Calibration Lab).Qualifications:Bachelor Degree in Electrical/Electronic Engineering.Minimum 4 years experience in E&E laboratory.Experience in instrument or electrical field.Basic Quality System.ISO/IEC 17025 Requirements.E&E Product Safety testing.Technical Knowledge in metrological measurement.Communication and Writing in English.

job_title: Operator / พนักงานแผนกผลิต
job_description: รายละเอียดงาน:ดำเนินการผลิต ดูแลเครื่องจักร ที่เกี่ยวข้องในกระบวนการผลิต ให้ดำเนินการผลิตได้อย่างต่อเนื่องทำความสะอาด เตรียมเครื่องจักรให้พร้อม ทั้งก่อนและหลังการผลิตเข้าร่วมกิจกรรมTPM / Overhaul ตามที่ผู้บังคับบัญชามอบหมายคุณสมบัติ:เพศ ชาย อายุ 18 – 30 ปีผ่านการรับราชการทหาร/ศึกษาวิชาทหารการศึกษา ปวส. สาขาไฟฟ้า,เครื่องกล,ช่างยนต์,อิเล็คทรอนิกส์ หรือ สาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องประสบการณ์ 0 – 2 ปี ขึ้นไป ด้านการผลิต , ช่างเทคนิค ในโรงงานอุตสาหกรรมมีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับระบบคุณภาพต่างๆเบื้องต้น มีทักษะในเชิงช่าง สามารถดูแล เครื่องจักรได้สวัสดิการ:โบนัส (ตามผลประกอบการ)ปรับฐานเงินเดือนประจำปีกองทุนประกันสังคมกองทุนเงินทดแทนกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพเบี้ยขยันทุกไตรมาส (ไตรมาสละ 3,000 บาท)ระดับปฏิบัติการ - ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการค่าครองชีพ 500 บาทต่อเดือนประกันอุบัติเหตุ,ประกันผู้ป่วยใน/นอกตามอัตราตรวจสุขภาพประจำปีชุดยูนิฟอร์มฟรีอาหารมื้อกลางวัน/มื้อกลางคืนฟรีรถตู้รับส่งพนักงานสายอยุธยา,รังสิต,สุทธิสารการอบรมและพัฒนาศักยภาพในการทำงาน และสายอาชีพอย่างต่อเนื่อง ฯลฯสถานที่ปฏิบัติงาน: นิคมอุตสาหกรรมโรจนะ โซน3ส่วนทรัพยากรมนุษย์บริษัท อิชิตัน กรุ๊ป จำกัด (มหาชน)111/1หมู่ 4 นิคมอุตสาหกรรมโรจนะโซน 3ตำบลอุทัย อำเภออุทัย จังหวัดพระนครศรีอยุธยา13210035-276-111 ต่อ 705 , 084-438-7693

DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIESProvide coverage for the Facilities Manager when the Facilities Manager is away.Create the asset register of all equipment on SHELLSite.Plan and manage the budgets for Engineering & Operational contracts;Support the facility manager in preparing the planned preventive maintenance schedules.Support the facility manager in preparing the commercial terms and conditions as applicable to plant and equipment service providers.Monitor & evaluate M&E vendor for services, statutory compliancePrepare the job descriptions of all technical staff and support them in their day today functions.Support the facility manager in developing the standard operating procedures manuals.Provide specialist advise to the technical team as and when required.Carry out Technical Audits for all installations at periodical intervals;Review stock levels of the required inventory of spares on site.Analyse call outs to understand trends; undertake strategic initiatives to minimize the same.Support the facility manager in preparing the contingency plan to deal with emergencies.Advise the facility manger in preparing the future maintenance budgets.Identify and implement energy conversation initiatives.Support the facility manager in preparing the management reports.Review of trend analysis to identify areas of service improvement.Conduct performance assessment of technical vendors.Support the facility manger in identifying training needs of the technical team.Responsible for preparation of critical spares list for all installations as per manufacturer’s recommendations and plan for the inventory where the maintenance is carried out with in-house teams. Implement and oversee the pre-emptive maintenance programme to reduce the risk of sudden failures of critical equipments.To review the maintenance /service practices of M&E contracts to deliver quality work practices in line with the manufacturer recommendations.Ensure Contractors follow the house rules at all times and the projects are handled with minimum inconvenience to the client.To ensure E&M operational SLA reports are prepared as per the specified time and sent across.Project managementLead of energy managementEMPLOYEE SPECIFICATIONSGraduate engineer in electrical/ mechanical disciplineGood command in English5 – 10 years experience in facilities managementTertiary qualifications in building management and/or business desirable Proven ability to handle electrical & mechanical functions effectivelyProven ability to initiate and follow through with energy saving measures

job_title: Calibration Technician/ช่างเทคนิคสอบเทียบเครื่องมือวัด
job_description: รายละเอียดงานปฏิบัติงานสอบเทียบเครื่องมือวัดตามแผนดำเนินกิจกรรมอื่นๆในงานดูแลเครื่องมือวัดให้มีพร้อมใช้งานจัดทำเอกสารและเก็บข้อมูลระบบเครื่องมือสอบเทียบคุณสมบัติเพศ : หญิง / ชาย (เพศชายผ่านการเกณฑ์ทหารหรือได้รับการยกเว้น)อายุ : 20 ปีขึ้นไปวุฒิ ปวส. / ปริญญาตรี สาขา เครื่องมือวัด,ไฟฟ้า,อิเล็กทรอนิกส์ประสบการณ์ 0-2 ปีมีความรู้ระบบ ISO 9001,ISO 14001,GMP.ต้องผ่านการอบรมในกลุ่มการสอบเทียบเครื่องมือวัดดังนี้การประเมินความไม่แน่นอนของการวัด / การสอบเทียบ pH meterการสอบเทียบ Conductivity Meter / การสอบเทียบเครื่องวัดความหวานการสอบเทียบเครื่องมือวัดความดันขั้นพื้นฐาน / การสอบเทียบเครื่องมือวัดอัตราการไหลของของเหลวการประเมินค่าความไม่แน่นอนของการวัดในการวิเคราะห์ทางเคมี (EMU) สวัสดิการโบนัส(ตามผลประกอบการ)ปรับฐานเงินเดือนประจำปีกองทุนประกันสังคมกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพเบี้ยขยันทุกไตรมาส (ไตรมาสละ 3,000 บาท) ระดับปฏิบัติการ - ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการค่าครองชีพ 500 บาทต่อเดือนประกันอุบัติเหตุ,ประกันผู้ป่วยใน/ผู้ป่วยนอกตรวจสุขภาพประจำปีชุดยูนิฟอร์ม ฟรีอาหารมื้อกลางวัน/มื้อกลางคืน ฟรีรถตู้รับส่งพนักงานสายอยุธยา,รังสิต,สุทธิสารการอบรมและพัฒนาศักยภาพในการทำงาน และสายอาชีพอย่างต่อเนื่องผู้ที่สนใจกรุณาส่งใบสมัครงาน พร้อมรูปถ่าย เงินเดือนปัจจุบันและเงินเดือนที่คาดหวังของท่านผ่านทางสมัครงาน/Apply Nowด้านล่าง หรือ ส่งเอกสารมายังบริษัท อิชิตันกรุ๊ป จำกัด (มหาชน)111/1 ม.4 ต.อุทัย อ.อุทัย จ.พระนครศรีอยุธยา (สาขาโรจนะ) 13210โทร.035-276-111 ต่อ 703มือถือ.084-438-7693

job_title: Electrical Technician/ช่างไฟฟ้า
job_description: Maintenance in processing line area with shift 24/7 as per production plan.Perform Shift Maintenance team work to ensure all machine are good operation.Perform preventive maintenance program and ensures the readiness of all the plant equipment in order meet the production volume requirement.Perform troubleshooting and breakdown maintenance to repair.Make Preventive Maintenance program and recording in the Sap system for history tracking.Ready to make work instruction for new system and method of engineering required.Conduct root cause analysis for machine breakdown and minimize operation down time.Initiates machine improvement and corrective action in the Utilities & Facility process.Follow QFS Procedure and monitoring process to ensure that Product without Quality Food Safety Issue.Follow Safety Procedure and monitoring process to ensure that machine and equipment without safety IssuePerforms other tasks / duties in support company goals and objectiveFollowing job / task assignment by Supervisor & Engineers.

job_title: Service Engineer/วิศวกร   (5 อัตรา)
job_description: หน้าที่งาน:ติดตั้งเครื่องมือทางการแพทย์บำรุงรักษาเชิงป้องกัน(Preventive Maintenance)ซ่อมบำรุง และเปลี่ยนอะไหล่ของผลิตภัณฑ์ตรวจสอบวิเคราะห์สภาพการชำรุดเสียหาย และแก้ปัญหาการใช้งานคุณสมบัติ:วุฒิการศึกษาระดับปริญญาตรี คณะวิศวกรรมศาสตร์ สาขาไฟฟ้า, อิเล็คทรอนิกส์,เครื่องมือและอุปกรณ์การแพทย์ หรืออื่น ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องเพศชาย/หญิง อายุ 27 - 35มีประสบการณ์ในสายงานอย่างน้อย 5 ปีมีความรู้พื้นฐานทางด้านไฟฟ้าอิเล็กทรอนิกส์หากมีประสบการณ์ด้านเครื่องมือแพทย์มาก่อนจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษสามารถสื่อสารภาษาอังกฤษได้ดีหากมีTOEIC 500 คะแนน ขึ้นไปจะพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ มีบุคลิกภาพดี รักงานบริการและมีความอดทนสูงสามารถเดินทางต่างจังหวัดได้สวัสดิการ:ประกันสุขภาพ-อุบัติเหตุท่องเที่ยวประจำปีพร้อมครอบครัวตรวจสุขภาพประจำปีกองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพประกันสังคมโบนัสประจำปีฝึกอบรมในและต่างประเทศเรียนภาษาอังกฤษท่องเที่ยวประจำปีพร้อมครอบครัวค่าน้ำมันรถ/ เดินทาง (ขึ้นกับตำแหน่งลักษณะงาน)บริษัท พรีเมียร์ บิสสิเนส อินเตอร์ จำกัด (ฝ่ายทรัพยากรบุคคล)888/111-113,116,117 อาคารมหาทุนพลาซ่า ชั้น 11 ถนนเพลินจิต แขวงลุมพินี เขตปทุมวัน กรุงเทพฯ 10330โทรศัพท์ :02-6508681 ต่อ 801-802www.pbi.co.th

job_title: Assistant Electrical Engineering Manager/ผู้ช่วยผู้จัดการฝ่ายวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า (1  ตำแหน่ง)
job_description: คุณสมบัติ:วุฒิปริญญาตรี สาขาวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้ามีประสบการณ์การบริหารด้านวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้าในโรงงานอุตสาหกรรม อย่างน้อย 7ปีมีใบประกอบวิชาชีพวิศวกรรมควบคุม สาขา ไฟฟ้ากำลังรายละเอียดของงาน:จัดการควบคุมดูแลและปฏิบัติตามโครงการปรับปรุงเครื่องจักรไฟฟ้าและระบบควบคุมไฟฟ้ารับผิดชอบคุมงานด้านวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า เกี่ยวกับการซ่อมบำรุงอุปกรณ์, ระบบควบคุมการส่งกำลังไฟฟ้าและระบบการสอบเทียบวางแผนควบคุมการทำงานของผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชาให้เป็นไปตามเป้าหมายบริษัทฯมีส่วนในการปรับปรุงกระบวนการผลิตให้เกิดประสิทธิภาพในการใช้เครื่องมือและอุปกรณ์ให้คำแนะนำ อบรม และให้ความรู้ต่อผู้ใต้บังคับบัญชา เกี่ยวกับงานด้านเทคนิค และการทำงานอย่างปลอดภัยดูแลและตรวจสอบงานติดตั้งและเพิ่มเติมของผู้รับเหมาให้เป็นไปตามนโยบายบริษัทฯประสานงานกับฝ่ายอื่นเพื่อความคล่องตัวในการทำงานปฏิบัติงานอื่นตามที่ผู้บังคับบัญชามอบหมายปฏิบัติงานวันจันทร์ – เสาร์รายได้:อัตราเงินเดือนตามตกลง+ ค่าตำแหน่งสวัสดิการ:เครื่องแบบพนักงาน, ค่าน้ำมัน, ค่าซ่อมบำรุงรถ, ค่าโทรศัพท์, กองทุนสำรองเลี้ยงชีพ, ประกันชีวิตกลุ่มInterested candidates please send your resume to:(Specifyposition you are applying and your name in the Subject line)byclick "Apply Now"And,fill application form on our company’s website:http://www.smpcplc.com/recruit_smpc/If you have any question, please contact:Human Resource DivisionSahamitr Pressure Container Public Company Limited92 Soi Thientalay 7 (4th Intersection)Bangkhunthien-Chaitalay Rd., Samaedam,Bangkhunthien, Bangkok 10150Tel: 02 895 4140-54

job_responsibilities: ['ResponsibilitiesTroubleshoot and solve design and integration issuesMaintain requirements specification for hardware design (based on electrical safety and regulatory compliance from OEMs and FAA)Work with Software Engineering to ensure that any changes to Software or Electronics are tested prior to release.Create, Review, approve and perform testing procedures, reports as per RTCA/DO-160 and OEM Requirements.Work with suppliers to review equipment design from electrical aspectsConduct test activities in a safe mannerTrain engineering peers on basic electronic knowledge, test setup & performance, and requirement analysis.Create and/or Review electronic component De-rating AnalysesTest Setup design and fabrication.Read, analyze, and interpret: general business periodicals, professional journals, technical procedures, Requirements, application notes, and governmental regulations.Present information and respond to questions from engineering peers, managers, clients, customers, and Sales personnel.']
job_qualifications: ['sDesired 5 years in a Electrical, power electronics fieldBachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, or equivalentKnowledge of ARP4754, RTCA DO-160, MIL- STD-810, DO-254 and DO-174 requirements as applied to electronicsKnowledge of designing and testing for EMI/EMC (filters, etc), analog and digital control systems and applicationExperience with the following standard laboratory equipment: ESD, Oscilloscope, data acquisition hardware, Digital Volt Meters, Programmable Power Supplies, Power Analyzers, and Sensors Fluent in Microsoft Office Suite; and, common software used in electrical engineering: P-Spice, Multism, AltiumKnowledge of power electronics: motor drivers, BC motors, power supply, power converters, power inverters and hydraulic power system componentsFluency in English and Thai preferred.Company WelfareFive - day work / weekMeal AllowanceTransportation AllowanceDiligence AllowanceOvertime PayProvident FundHealth & Life InsuranceCompany Activities (Company Party, Sports, Annual Trip etc.)Successful applicant will receive attractive salary, food, gasoline allowance, and many other fringe benefits. Please submit resume (English only)in PDF or Microsoft Word only,relevant documents, recent photograph and expected salary to:APPLY NOWSafran Cabin Lamphun Ltd.Northern Region Industrial Estate68/2- Moo 4 Tambon Banklang, Amphur Muang, Lamphun 51000Contact Person: Human Resources DepartmentTel. +66 53 569 300Fax. +66 53 582 128www.zodiacaerospace.com ']
job_description: ResponsibilitiesTroubleshoot and solve design and integration issuesMaintain requirements specification for hardware design (based on electrical safety and regulatory compliance from OEMs and FAA)Work with Software Engineering to ensure that any changes to Software or Electronics are tested prior to release.Create, Review, approve and perform testing procedures, reports as per RTCA/DO-160 and OEM Requirements.Work with suppliers to review equipment design from electrical aspectsConduct test activities in a safe mannerTrain engineering peers on basic electronic knowledge, test setup & performance, and requirement analysis.Create and/or Review electronic component De-rating AnalysesTest Setup design and fabrication.Read, analyze, and interpret: general business periodicals, professional journals, technical procedures, Requirements, application notes, and governmental regulations.Present information and respond to questions from engineering peers, managers, clients, customers, and Sales personnel.QualificationsDesired 5 years in a Electrical, power electronics fieldBachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, or equivalentKnowledge of ARP4754, RTCA DO-160, MIL- STD-810, DO-254 and DO-174 requirements as applied to electronicsKnowledge of designing and testing for EMI/EMC (filters, etc), analog and digital control systems and applicationExperience with the following standard laboratory equipment: ESD, Oscilloscope, data acquisition hardware, Digital Volt Meters, Programmable Power Supplies, Power Analyzers, and Sensors Fluent in Microsoft Office Suite; and, common software used in electrical engineering: P-Spice, Multism, AltiumKnowledge of power electronics: motor drivers, BC motors, power supply, power converters, power inverters and hydraulic power system componentsFluency in English and Thai preferred.Company WelfareFive - day work / weekMeal AllowanceTransportation AllowanceDiligence AllowanceOvertime PayProvident FundHealth & Life InsuranceCompany Activities (Company Party, Sports, Annual Trip etc.)Successful applicant will receive attractive salary, food, gasoline allowance, and many other fringe benefits. Please submit resume (English only)in PDF or Microsoft Word only,relevant documents, recent photograph and expected salary to:APPLY NOWSafran Cabin Lamphun Ltd.Northern Region Industrial Estate68/2- Moo 4 Tambon Banklang, Amphur Muang, Lamphun 51000Contact Person: Human Resources DepartmentTel. +66 53 569 300Fax. +66 53 582 128www.zodiacaerospace.com

job_responsibilities: ['Western Digital®The next big thing in data is you!ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:New ProductLeads factory cross functional team to manage New Products Readiness for successful market launch per committed schedule, in order to achieve KPI targets for volume ramp, yield, quality, scrap and cost. Manage and coordinate all factory efforts to prepare and supporting development builds and customer samples thru Volume Production Review. This involves reviewing all new material, cum process requirements, interfacing with other sites to solicit required support and training and working out a systematic factory implementation plan.Manages factory cross-functional teams to facilitate the resolution of program issues in order to ensure program objectives and deliverable are achievedInventory management control.Establish, add or change appropriated work instruction and report.Perform related work as assigned.Manage and coordinate all factory efforts to prepare and supporting development builds and customer samples thru Volume Production Review.Perform New Product Launch activities, Product and Program management throughout product life cycle, and Engineering Change Control. 9. Coordinate Engineering Change implementation to MFG site by coordination with Development and MFG related person to establish Engineering Change effectiveness in MFG site to meet business requirementPerform operation or deploy an appropriated instruction and reportSustaining ProductSupport and work with other functional teams to clear any roadblocks that might impact the release timeline.Lead/support the implementation of engineering changes (EC’s) once the qualification is complete withconditions/restriction control as necessary.Lead or collaborate with other relevant functional & operations teams in order to define an efficient ramp plan to meet the business needs.Lead and manage the sustaining qualification & arrange the priority based on business requirements.Track and Transfer Lessons Learned to other products and future programs via the Western Digital Tracking Report System.']

job_responsibilities: ['ResponsibilityDelivers the construction project successfully to the customer while minimizing all risks. This incorporates issues such as ensuring proper authorizations have been received before expending cost, and ensuring proper co-ordination with internal departments, operations organization and other third party suppliers has taken place to prevent work conflicts.Establishes the scope of project, addressing all aspects including but not limited to business requirements, performance specifications, planning, cost, interdependencies, procurement strategies and legal approval. Identifies all consultants to be appointed and appoints the same based on clearly documented scopes of work and fee schedules as well as approval from both the customer and CBRE management.Develops the scope and initial design up to the procurement stage. Responsible for all design management of suppliers and subcontractors. Requires the milestones in the schedule to be tracked and met, the design completed to meet performance specifications, budget developed to meet financial requirements, and clear approval from the customer, dependent departments and third parties.Undertakes contract negotiations, and competitive bidding to ensure the best value is being delivered to the customer and make the formal recommendation to the buyer with integrity and SOX compliance Ensures the project is implemented in accordance with the design and ensures a timely response to questions related to field conditions. Ensures all work is done in a safe manner and that customer and vendor welfare is addressed at all stages. Monitors progress against the schedule and takes corrective action where necessary. Works with all parties to ensure prompt and accurate information is provided to all partiesWorks with the customer and vendor to ensure the end product is delivered per the agreed requirements. Ensures all punch list work is completed in a timely manner and that it does not interfere with the client’s ability to occupy the space. Reviews and approves payment to contractors after verification that work was completed. Ensures all O&M manuals are received and reviewed and the necessary training is received by staff on equipment. Documents and files all warranties, and as built drawings and closes out the project in accordance with regulatory requirements and industrial practices.Responsible for all aspects of the project, especially for the quality and compliance of the works and deliveries.Provides focal point for all parties interfacing on the project. Ensures all information/input is received by all parties in a timely manner and facilitates all aspects of the project.Works with customers to develop and deliver projects that best service their needs.']
job_qualifications: ['Bachelor degree or above in Construction Management, Architecture or Electrical Engineering required.More than ten years of post-graduate experience in the fields of construction, engineering, interiors, or architecture with at least two of these in Project Management.Fab and Clean Room experience requiredDemonstrated experience with managing customer s, vendors, consultants and other third parties.Strong communication, organization and persuasion skills. skills, fluent oral and written EnglishDemonstrated financial and budgeting acumen.Integrity and policy compliant.Strong IT user skills with a working knowledge of AutoCAD, Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point, Project. ']
job_description: ResponsibilityDelivers the construction project successfully to the customer while minimizing all risks. This incorporates issues such as ensuring proper authorizations have been received before expending cost, and ensuring proper co-ordination with internal departments, operations organization and other third party suppliers has taken place to prevent work conflicts.Establishes the scope of project, addressing all aspects including but not limited to business requirements, performance specifications, planning, cost, interdependencies, procurement strategies and legal approval. Identifies all consultants to be appointed and appoints the same based on clearly documented scopes of work and fee schedules as well as approval from both the customer and CBRE management.Develops the scope and initial design up to the procurement stage. Responsible for all design management of suppliers and subcontractors. Requires the milestones in the schedule to be tracked and met, the design completed to meet performance specifications, budget developed to meet financial requirements, and clear approval from the customer, dependent departments and third parties.Undertakes contract negotiations, and competitive bidding to ensure the best value is being delivered to the customer and make the formal recommendation to the buyer with integrity and SOX compliance Ensures the project is implemented in accordance with the design and ensures a timely response to questions related to field conditions. Ensures all work is done in a safe manner and that customer and vendor welfare is addressed at all stages. Monitors progress against the schedule and takes corrective action where necessary. Works with all parties to ensure prompt and accurate information is provided to all partiesWorks with the customer and vendor to ensure the end product is delivered per the agreed requirements. Ensures all punch list work is completed in a timely manner and that it does not interfere with the client’s ability to occupy the space. Reviews and approves payment to contractors after verification that work was completed. Ensures all O&M manuals are received and reviewed and the necessary training is received by staff on equipment. Documents and files all warranties, and as built drawings and closes out the project in accordance with regulatory requirements and industrial practices.Responsible for all aspects of the project, especially for the quality and compliance of the works and deliveries.Provides focal point for all parties interfacing on the project. Ensures all information/input is received by all parties in a timely manner and facilitates all aspects of the project.Works with customers to develop and deliver projects that best service their needs.QualificationBachelor degree or above in Construction Management, Architecture or Electrical Engineering required.More than ten years of post-graduate experience in the fields of construction, engineering, interiors, or architecture with at least two of these in Project Management.Fab and Clean Room experience requiredDemonstrated experience with managing customer s, vendors, consultants and other third parties.Strong communication, organization and persuasion skills. skills, fluent oral and written EnglishDemonstrated financial and budgeting acumen.Integrity and policy compliant.Strong IT user skills with a working knowledge of AutoCAD, Microsoft Word, Excel, Power Point, Project.

job_title: Senior Officer - CHS Troubleshooting (PLC and SCADA)
job_responsibilities: ['Accountability:-Closely follow up and review the Preventive Maintenance Plan and PM result of the Electrical system for Coal Handling System.Corrective Maintenance and Troubleshooting the electrical system for Coal Handling System and Medium Voltage for Mining activity in case the complicated system breakdown.To initially review and manage the improvement/modification project and all electrical project.Responsible to preliminary assess the risk analysis and break-even point for Electrical team project.Budget managing and controlling for Mine Electrical Maintenance Budget.Planning, assess and calculate the necessary equipment and properly shutdown plan for Coal Incoming relocation.Training and development the staff knowledge/necessary skill and also prepare work procedure and work instruction for company knowledge management.Perform to comply with Company Policy and SHEs.Participate to fulfill environmental and safety management system, which are ISO 14001 and ISO 45001']
job_qualifications: [":-At least Bachelor's degree or Higher, major in Electrical Engineering or any related field.At least 3-5 years of work experience in maintenance, troubleshooting and contract management in electrical system.Preferable having experience in electrical conveyor system or PLC and SCADA system.Good English (TOEIC 500)    "]
job_description: Accountability:-Closely follow up and review the Preventive Maintenance Plan and PM result of the Electrical system for Coal Handling System.Corrective Maintenance and Troubleshooting the electrical system for Coal Handling System and Medium Voltage for Mining activity in case the complicated system breakdown.To initially review and manage the improvement/modification project and all electrical project.Responsible to preliminary assess the risk analysis and break-even point for Electrical team project.Budget managing and controlling for Mine Electrical Maintenance Budget.Planning, assess and calculate the necessary equipment and properly shutdown plan for Coal Incoming relocation.Training and development the staff knowledge/necessary skill and also prepare work procedure and work instruction for company knowledge management.Perform to comply with Company Policy and SHEs.Participate to fulfill environmental and safety management system, which are ISO 14001 and ISO 45001Qualification:-At least Bachelor's degree or Higher, major in Electrical Engineering or any related field.At least 3-5 years of work experience in maintenance, troubleshooting and contract management in electrical system.Preferable having experience in electrical conveyor system or PLC and SCADA system.Good English (TOEIC 500)

job_title: Lead of Process Engineer - Process Improvement
job_responsibilities: ['Responsibilities :Lead junior engineering team for daily/weekly/monthly KPI monitoring & tracking for further improvement.Lead team of KPI improvement (yield, cycle time, downtime, productivity, quality) for responsible products and perform continuous improvement activities.Lead to set up control and monitoring process to ensure the process capability are in control.To be lead line buy off/release after shutdown to ensure process/tooling/fixture have a good condition for production.Design of experiment, data collecting including analysis to make improvement and/or modification.Update the work instruction and maintain update the latest procedure base on engineering data and change notice.Assessing safety and environment issue is addressing thru the process step design.Work coordinate with development team for new product, process, tool, equipment that transfer to production line.Control full process flow final design of new product/process/tooling transfer from development phase to sustaining phase to ensure production be able to continue run as mass production with minimize excursion of productivity and quality. Identify key parameters for cost reduction or optimization to reduce scrap cost, overhead cost, or other cost related to responsible process.Co-ordinate with machine maker, and/or supplier for BU activities.Improve skill of operators to support production line & engineering operator to support improvement activities.Support management assignment.']

หน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบควบคุมการผลิตไฟฟ้าจากระบบSolar Cell และจัดทำรายงานประจำวัน ประจำเดือน (ประจำ 3 เดือน, ประจำ 6 เดือน, ประจำ 1 ปี)ควบคุมดำเนินการงานบำรุงรักษา ระบบ อุปกรณ์ ภายในโรงไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ให้พร้อมใช้งานตลอดเวลาวางแผนงานบำรุงรักษา และควบคุมงานให้ดำเนินการตามแผนงาน ในการบำรุงรักษาระบบ อุปกรณ์ ภายในโรงไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ ให้เป็นไปตามระเบียบดำเนินการของบริษัทฯ ตามมาตรฐานISO วิเคราะห์ปัญหาที่เกิดขึ้นกับระบบ อุปกรณ์ ภายในโรงไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ ทำการแก้ไข และทำการป้องกันการเกิดซ้ำประสานงานผู้รับเหมาช่วงในการดำเนินการตามกิจกรรม ที่บริษัทฯ ทำการว่าจ้าง และควบคุมการดำเนินการให้บรรลุผลดำเนินการตรวจวัดค่าพลังงานไฟฟ้า และคุณภาพไฟฟ้าของโรงงานพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ดำเนินการรวบรวมข้อมูลจากการดำเนินการงานO&M จัดทำรายงานสรุป เพื่อรายงานผู้ที่เกี่ยวข้องงานอื่นๆ ที่ได้รับมอบหมายคุณสมบัติเพศชาย อายุ22 ปีขึ้นไป วุฒิอนุปริญญาหรือปริญญาตรี สาขาวิชาไฟฟ้ากำลังหรืออิเล็กทรอนิกส์ (ยินดีต้อนรับนักศึกษาจบใหม่)มีประสบการณ์ด้านงานO&M โรงงานไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ อย่างน้อย 1 ปีขึ้นไปมีความรู้ทางด้านงานก่อสร้าง ติดตั้งอุปกรณ์ โรงงานไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์สามารถใช้งานเครื่องมือวัดในการตรวจเช็คอุปกรณ์ต่างๆได้ เช่น กล้องถ่ายภาพความร้อนSolar I-V Tester, Ground Testerมีความรู้ด้านInstrument & Control PLC สามารถใช้งานคอมพิวเตอร์และโปรแกรมMS Office ได้เป็นอย่างดี

job_title: Instrument Commissioning Technician (Oil Gas/control valves, pressure, temperature ) (6 positions)
job_description: External hire of Project Personnel –Position: Commissioning Instrument TechnicianScope of work:The commissioning instrument technician shall participate in preparation and execution of pre-commissioning and commissioning activities with the field instrumentation on the moduleWork tasks:• Attend MC verification of equipment and packages• Execute punch out of work in the field and document punches using Company Data system• Evaluate test equipment and tools needed before commissioning start• Carry out commissioning preparation checks for all system related equipment• Participate in multidiscipline commissioning according to commissioning procedures and Company safety standards• Responsible for mark up of relevant documents with changes identified during Commissioning• Ensure that the commissioning work is conducted in accordance with Commissioning Manual principles, procedures, schedules and a high technical quality to achieve a timely start-up, operational reliability and safety• Ensure safe commissioning with high focus on HSE by him/herself and all parties involved• Be proactive and take corrective actions as required• Ensure high focus on interfaces towards all involved parties and coordination at site• Identify deviations/non-conformities and handle these in accordance with project proceduresExperience/qualifications needed: • Technical preferably higher education or long experience in working with field instrumentation, operating and maintenance of Field Instrument equipment such as control valves, pressure, temperature, flow transmitters etc.• Ability to read and understand P&ID’s, wiring diagrams, logic diagrams etc.• Looptest experience• Knowledge of Distributed Control System, especially Kongsberg Maritime is an advantage• Experience with different communication protocols i.e HART, Modbus, Profibus, ProfNet, Pakscan etc.• Experience in commissioning phase of a project• Ne/He test experience is an advantage. • Familiarity with ProCoCys and STID is an advantage• Candidate must be solution oriented and be able to work independentlyFircroft Thailand22nd Floor, 2202 Pacific Place II Building, 142Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok,, Thailand 10110Contact K Chairat Chadavipoo02 653 2947 Ext 136                                    RMS 223614

An exciting SMT Manager (x1 vacancy) job has just become available at Electronic manufacturer based in Rayong, Thailand. This is a role for SMT Manager who thrive on challenging opportunity. About the SMT Manager (Surface Mount Technology) Role:You will be leading the team and play a vital role to deliver sound and effective process operation. The salary range for this role is THB 100k - 120k per month + benefits + massive bonus.Key Responsibilities:General assists in the production line of surface mount technologies, which involve attaching electronic materials to printed circuit boardsDevelop and implement advanced processes and SMT methodologiesPerform defect and failure analyses for Surface Mount Technology (SMT)Lead improvements in process yield, quality, cycle time, inventory accuracy and deliveryInspect various machinery, tools, and materials involved in the process to make sure that they are working properly.Lead a team of SMT Machine Operators and Process TechniciansReport direct to Plant ManagerTo succeed in the SMT Manager (Surface Mount Technology) job, you will need to have experiences on electronic industry with the ability to work effectively and co-operatively with the team.Key Requirements:Bachelor's or Master degree in EngineeringAt least 10 years in experience in electronic manufacturingStrong knowledge in SMT processSolid background in electronic businessMust have been working in MNC company with good understanding in international operationsMust have strong people management, leadership and presentation skillsGood command in English language This electronic company needs no introduction and is recognised as the leader in their field of expertise. The culture is demanding but if you are confident and have a can-do attitude the potential rewards are significant and there are great opportunities to progress in this dynamic company.If you are a driven and determined SMT Manager with proven track record of achievements in manufacturing environment, this is an excellent opportunity for you.Apply today for this exciting opportunity. Robert Walters Recruitment (Thailand) LimitedRecruitment License No.: น. 1188 / 2551

Piping Shop and Field SupervisorOBJECTIVES:This position is accountable for supervising piping works under the direction of Piping Manager to complete it to meet both schedule and quality requirement by daily patrol at site to follow the work check items to prevent problems. Daily progress of works and problems shall be immediately reported to Piping Manager and ask his instruction, which should be conveyed to the relating sections without delay and shall be supervised to complete it.Implementation of CLIENT s SHES program throughout the project duration, to display a positive leadership and maintain good relationships with all site Management, personnel and other third parties to achieve the below objectives.- Zero accidents,- Zero personal injuries,- Zero property losses or damage,- by continuously encouraging safety consciousness and stringently applying the rules of the construction project siteMAJOR DUTIES AND RESULTS:Receive “ Safety Induction Course”Receive the instruction of the job to be performed as his duties from the Piping Manager.Receive the orientation of the field office function from Admin. Manager.Receive the safety induction course from Safety Control Manager / Supervisor.Review the latest status of “For Construction Drawings “and “Specifications For Construction “, and ensure that the same latest Drawings and Specifications are in use by the subcontractor, and if not make sure the subcontractor collects the latest issues.Report of the document status to the Discipline Manager.Attend meetings directed by Discipline Manager.Monitor subcontractor’s work (refer to the Check List prepared at Construction Department) and direct for correction and report it to discipline manager. oCheck color coding or stencils for the pipes, fittings, valves and others based on the specifications.oCheck angle and size of beveling portions by sampling inspection.oConfirm the spools and lines cleanness in accordance with “Built it Clean”oInspect required inlet and outlet straight line length of orifice flanges and prepare inspection reports of them.oInspect internal grinding surface of orifice flange and prepare inspection reports of them.oCheck correct wearing of badges as "Qualified Welders".oCheck welding points necessary for pre-heating instructed by the welding procedure specification.oCheck drying of welding rods.oCheck correct application of welding rods with the welding procedure specificationoCheck removal and cleaning of welding slug and spatter.oCheck layers and throat thickness at fillet welding in accordance with the related specification(s).oCheck size of shop fabricated spool pieces and position and direction of branch pipes.oCheck progress of pipe rack, sleeper, structure and equipment erection works at site, and report it to the Senior Piping Supervisor as necessary information for preparing piping work schedule.oCheck installation of temporary supports necessary for reducing stress to nozzles of equipment during piping work execution around equipment, especially rotary machinery.oCheck correct use of brushes and grinding stones specified for stainless steel materials.oCheck correct installation of the Globe, Check, and "Y" type Vales from the point of direction of flow in the line.oCheck the Item No. and correct installation of the following parts from the point of direction of flow in the line:Restriction Orifice, Steam Trap, Tee Type Strainer, Y" type strainer, Bucket Type Strainer , Control Valve , Oval Meter, Turbine Meter & Roter MeteroCheck the Item No. of following parts:Spectacle Blind, Sample Cooler, Flexible Tube, Expansion Joint, Spring Hanger, Flame Arrester, Breather Valve, Temperature Instrument, Level Instrument, Orifice Plate, On-Off Valve, Safety Relief Valve, Level GaugeoPrepare the Test Flow Sheets for lines.oCheck the test package readiness.oCheck correct connection and installation of the lines and equipment based on the Test Flow Sheets.oCheck the Chlorine Ion content, of test water as specified for stainless steel line(s).oCheck collect position of instruments.oCheck seal welding of the plug at the process, utility oil, or gas lines, in case of the line venting without valve.oCheck the cold set point of spring hanger and removal of shipping lock pin, and prepare the status list of it.oCheck removal of the shipping lock pin for expansion joint, and prepare the status list of it.oCheck removal of the temporary blind plates used for test and flushing, and prepare the re-installation status report.oCheck the installation of the restriction orifice. confirm the flow direction.oCheck the situation as an open or close of the spectacle blind plate(s) in accordance with the Pre-Commissioning Procedure.oCheck replacement of the permanent gasket by a new one.Coordinate interfacing work with other discipline supervisorsAttend inspection for QC and input the results of inspection daily, weekly and monthly into the computerized progress monitoring system provided by Employer. Now we're looking forSuperintendent - Construction,Electricalas detail below;Location: ChonburiCondition: ContractResponsibilitiesResponsible for managing all site construction activities and supervising field personnel as required to ensure adherence to international standards, agreed budget, schedule and construction sequence. Responsible for supervising construction activities of Subcontractor trades personnel related to a discipline.Maintains the highest quality standards while administering good construction safety practices with all on-site activities.Ensure that all company employees and contractors are adhering to the company Health, Safety, and Environmental excellence policy.Promote job site safety, encourages safe work practices and rectifies job site hazards immediately. Direct all field personnel including those of construction contractors to achieve completion of the project on schedule, with quality workmanship that conforms to original plans and specifications. Ensure that all supervisors understand the construction KPI’s and their personal KPI’s, and strive to achieve these.Understands the systems turnover plan and sequence and ensures that the work is performed accordingly.Has responsibility to take decisions relating to allocated work scope to ensure completion to schedule, quality and budget"]

job_responsibilities: ['Location: BangkokWe are comprised of a diverse, dedicated and multi-talented workforce of more than 8,000 employees worldwide. Solar Turbines offers a strong benefits package and professional growth opportunities.Job Description: Fleet ManagerLead development of the ongoing master overhaul plan and fuel efficiency program with multi dealers and customers.Provides technical and commercial direction, interpretation and consultation with dealers maintaining customer equipment to maximize up-time and minimize cost.To management of the covered equipment under the assigned Long-Term Service Agreement (LTSA), demonstrating the value of Equipment Health Management (EHM).Work closely with Solar Regional / District field operations to maintain and enhance Service Quality delivery and Customer relationships.Accountable for financial health of the contract, including costs, pricing and liabilities.Leads periodic customer report out on value received and state of contract.Job Description: Fleet EngineerProviding technical and administrative support to Fleet Managers in maintaining and managing Machinery Management Agreements between Solar and customers.implements machinery management solutions and recommend improvement plans utilizing, Insight System, and Equipment Health Management Tools and Processes.Provides technical support of the gas turbine packages and regular equipment assessments.To support the customers technical staff of as well as to Solar technicians and assists with completion of maintenance tasks on equipment under contract.']

job_description: Location: BangkokWe are comprised of a diverse, dedicated and multi-talented workforce of more than 8,000 employees worldwide. With decades of experience, Solar Turbines’ global team is committed to the common goal of exceeding customer needs. Solar Turbines offers a strong benefits package and professional growth opportunities.Job Description: Fleet ManagerLead development of the ongoing master overhaul plan and fuel efficiency program with multi dealers and customers.Provides technical and commercial direction, interpretation and consultation with dealers maintaining customer equipment to maximize up-time and minimize cost.To management of the covered equipment under the assigned Long-Term Service Agreement (LTSA), demonstrating the value of Equipment Health Management (EHM).Work closely with Solar Regional / District field operations to maintain and enhance Service Quality delivery and Customer relationships.Accountable for financial health of the contract, including costs, pricing and liabilities.Leads periodic customer report out on value received and state of contract.Job Description: Fleet EngineerProviding technical and administrative support to Fleet Managers in maintaining and managing Machinery Management Agreements between Solar and customers.implements machinery management solutions and recommend improvement plans utilizing, Insight System, and Equipment Health Management Tools and Processes.Provides technical support of the gas turbine packages and regular equipment assessments.To support the customers technical staff of as well as to Solar technicians and assists with completion of maintenance tasks on equipment under contract.Qualification Require:Bachelor’s degree in mechanical, Electrical Engineering or related filed.Experience 7 - 9 years in the Power Generation / Oil & Gas industries.Experience with Solar Turbines equipment, oil and Gas will be highly desired.Knowledge of gas turbine and Turbo machinery equipment and be able to understand, evaluate and analyze complex technical information.Strong accountability, proactive planner and organizer.Strong technical management and interpersonal skilled.Ability to work effectively under pressure.Able to work several travels (Domestic & oversea)Excellent English communication skilled.Interested applicants are invited to walk-in apply or send full resume indicating qualifications and experience, expected salary and recent photo to e-mail address below.Human ResourceSolar TurbinesCaterpillar Companywww.solarturbines.com/en_US/careers.html โทร033-011518 (หมายเลขโทรศัพท์นี้ใช้สำหรับการติดต่อสมัครงานเท่านั้น)

job_title: Project Director (Infrastructure) railway/ highway/ port operator EPC Project
job_description: Responsibilities:Driving the company's objectives and goals and providing practical solutions to the senior management.Taking ownership of the business, spearhead its go-to-market strategy and project development activities, and being responsible for managing risk and delivering profit, including responsibility and maintaining in accordance with the law and regulations. Planning and implementing long term business strategies to achieve the company’s objectives.Managing and working with engineering and project development team for projects on hand.Monitoring on planning & scheduling, cost estimation, project administration, interface management and delivery.Project, EPC and contract management.Coordinating with internal teams and all relevant external parties e.g. sponsor/shareholder, industrial estate, contracts, lenders, lenders’ advisor and contractor.Leading and managing execution of the project by coordinating internal.Contract negotiation, contract reviewing and budget control.Presenting and reporting projects to management.Requirements:Bachelor’s degree in Engineering and master’s degree in Business Management, Finance, Economics or related fields.Minimum 12 years’ experience in project development or project management, of which 8 years in management level.Experience in infrastructure business such as railway/ highway/ port operator etc.Overseas Experience would be an advantage.Experience in management of scope, cost, schedules and vendors/subcontractors in varied contract arrangements.Sound knowledge of engineering techniques, processes and tools, and strong contractual knowledge.Inter-personal relationship skills, ability to communicate with people of different cultures and backgrounds.Strong business development, project development and corporate planning knowledge with commercial mind.Strong leadership and management skills.Fluent in English both of written and verbal and good computer literacy.Ability to travel/work in upcountry and abroad.Goal – Oriented, Unity, Learning, Flexible.please send resume to :CChadavipoo @ fircroft.com (อีเมล์ติดกันหมด)22nd Floor, 2202 Pacific Place II Building, 142Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok,, Thailand 1011002 653 2947 Ext 136(RMS0222279)

job_title: Sr.Quantity Survey or QS (Mechanical) Refinery (Many Positions)
job_description: Quantity Surveyor Responsibilities:Reviewing construction plans and preparing quantity requirements.Scrutinizing maintenance and material costs, as well as contracts to ensure the best deals.Liaising with site managers, clients, contractors, and subcontractors.Preparing reports, analyses, contracts, budgets, risk assessment, and other documents.Advising managers and clients on improvements and new strategies.Keeping track of materials and ordering more when required.Documenting any changes in design and updating budgets.Establishing and maintaining professional relationships with external and internal stakeholders.Traveling from the office to various sites as required.Quantity Surveyor Requirements:Bachelor's degree in Quantity Surveying, Engineering, Management, or similar.Construction estimating or finance experienced is advantageous.Strong analytical and critical thinking skills.Sound knowledge of construction.Excellent negotiating and interpersonal skills.Ability to organize, plan, and strategize.A valid driver's license.Great networking abilities.Please send resumeCChadavipoo @ fircroft.com (อีเมล์ติดกันหมด)Fircroft Thailand22nd Floor, 2202 Pacific Place II Building, 142Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok,, Thailand 10110Contact K Chairat Chadavipoo02 653 2947 Ext 136224038

job_responsibilities: [' Job Descriptionสำรวจ คำนวณ ออกแบบ และควบคุมการติดตั้ง Solar Rooftop, Ground Mounted, Floating ให้เป็นไปตามที่รับมอบหมายติดตามความก้าวหน้าของงานโครงการ จัดทำรายงาน และสนับสนุนผู้จัดการโครงการและวิศวกรโครงการในการควบคุมงานและรายงานความก้าวหน้าต่อเจ้าของโครงการทดสอบ วัดค่าทางไฟฟ้าและพลังงาน ของระบบ Solar ที่ติดตั้ง เพื่อนำระบบเข้าใช้งานและจ่ายไฟฟ้าได้อย่างปลอดภัยตรวจสอบ สรุปข้อมูลจากระบบ SCADA และจัดทำรายงานออกแบบ เขียนแบบ ทางวิศวกรรมเพื่อสนับสนุนการจัดทำใบอนุญาตต่าง ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องถอดแบบ ประมาณราคา สนับสนุนการจัดซื้อ จัดหาวัสดุอุปกรณ์ที่จำเป็น']
job_qualifications: ['sจบการศึกษาในสาขาวิชาวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า ในแขนงไฟฟ้ากำลัง, พลังงานไฟฟ้า หรือ อื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องสามารถออกแบบ เขียนแบบทางวิศวกรรม โดยใช้โปรแกรม AutoCAD 3D, PVsystมีประสบการณ์ ทางด้านระบบฯ ผลิตไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีประสบการณ์ทำงานอย่างน้อย 7 ปี ในสายพลังงานหรือออกแบบระบบไฟฟ้า หรือ ทำงานในสายงานระบบฯ ผลิตไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์มาก่อนสามารถใช้ Computer ได้ และมีความคล่องแคล่วและทักษะในการใช้งานโปรแกรม เช่น MS Office ']
job_description: Job Descriptionสำรวจ คำนวณ ออกแบบ และควบคุมการติดตั้ง Solar Rooftop, Ground Mounted, Floating ให้เป็นไปตามที่รับมอบหมายติดตามความก้าวหน้าของงานโครงการ จัดทำรายงาน และสนับสนุนผู้จัดการโครงการและวิศวกรโครงการในการควบคุมงานและรายงานความก้าวหน้าต่อเจ้าของโครงการทดสอบ วัดค่าทางไฟฟ้าและพลังงาน ของระบบ Solar ที่ติดตั้ง เพื่อนำระบบเข้าใช้งานและจ่ายไฟฟ้าได้อย่างปลอดภัยตรวจสอบ สรุปข้อมูลจากระบบ SCADA และจัดทำรายงานออกแบบ เขียนแบบ ทางวิศวกรรมเพื่อสนับสนุนการจัดทำใบอนุญาตต่าง ๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องถอดแบบ ประมาณราคา สนับสนุนการจัดซื้อ จัดหาวัสดุอุปกรณ์ที่จำเป็นQualificationsจบการศึกษาในสาขาวิชาวิศวกรรมไฟฟ้า ในแขนงไฟฟ้ากำลัง, พลังงานไฟฟ้า หรือ อื่นๆ ที่เกี่ยวข้องสามารถออกแบบ เขียนแบบทางวิศวกรรม โดยใช้โปรแกรม AutoCAD 3D, PVsystมีประสบการณ์ ทางด้านระบบฯ ผลิตไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์ จะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษมีประสบการณ์ทำงานอย่างน้อย 7 ปี ในสายพลังงานหรือออกแบบระบบไฟฟ้า หรือ ทำงานในสายงานระบบฯ ผลิตไฟฟ้าพลังงานแสงอาทิตย์มาก่อนสามารถใช้ Computer ได้ และมีความคล่องแคล่วและทักษะในการใช้งานโปรแกรม เช่น MS Office

job_description: Position:           HVAC EngineerLocation:          ChonburiContract Term ContractWorking Hour: TBAStart Date:  ASAPResponsibilitiesPlan, organize, and lead engineering and design activities related to HVAC systems and equipment inoil and gas platform.Understand the desired goal of the system and designs the optimal HVAC systems to meet the requirements.Plan, organize and execute P&IDs, PFDs, airflow diagrams, AF&IDs, zoning diagrams, pressurization diagrams, HVAC ductwork and HVAC piping plans, sections, details, and equipment schedules in all phases, from Feasibility through Concept and Basic until Detailed Design.Interface closely and support the other disciplines, e.g. Civil, Electrical, Automation, Piping, to formalize the HVAC needs and to support the design of the related systems out of HVAC scope Select and size the aeraulic control equipment (dampers, cassettes etc.) and the related control systems in collaboration with the vendors and other engineering disciplinesIdentify, dimension and specify equipment such as air distribution in-line devices.Participate to the HVAC Equipment Vendors and Works Contractors selection by aligning technically the offersQualifications:Thai nationalityBachelor Degree in Mechanical or Industrial EngineeringMore than 3 years experinces in Mechanical Equipment installation of offshore/ onshore Oil & Gas, Refinery, Power Plan or related industry.Onshore or Offshore or Oil & Gas or related industry or Module construction background is preferred.Knowledge of Mechanical Equipment installation basic and measurement tools such as Venier Calliper, Inside Micrometer, Outside Micrometer, Dial Gauge, Theodolite and Feeler Gauge etc.Abilty in English (speaking and writing)Any interested candidates please apply with your update CV and contact details, only shortlisted candidate will be contacted by our Consultant for further evaluation.

หน้าที่และความรับผิดชอบกำหนด ทบทวน ปรับเปลี่ยนนโยบาย และวางแผนกลยุทธ์ในการบริหารโรงไฟฟ้าวางแผนการลงทุนในโครงการต่าง ๆวางแผน ควบคุม ติดตามผลการบริหารงานประจำวันของหน่วยงานต่าง ๆ ในความรับผิดชอบตัดสินใจแก้ไขปัญหา บริหารงาน และให้คำปรึกษากิจกรรมต่าง ๆ ที่เกี่ยวของกับโรงไฟฟ้ากำกับ ดูแล ควบคุมพนักงานภายในโรงงานให้ปฏิบัติหน้าที่ตามJob description ,Work Instruction ของแต่ละคนศึกษาวิธีการทำงานให้มีประสิทธิภาพยิ่งขึ้น รวมถึงหาวิธีการประหยัดเวลาและค่าใช้จ่ายต่าง ๆดำเนินการตามระบบมาตรฐานISO9000,ISO14001, TIS/OHSAS18000สำรวจกิจกรรมหลักของโรงไฟฟ้า วิเคราะห์สิ่งแวดล้อม ประเด็นปัญหา กำหนดเกณฑ์ในการประเมิน และทำการประเมินและทบทวนลักษณะปัญหาพิจารณาอนุมัติการจัดทำกฎระเบียบด้านความปลอดภัย แจ้งเปลี่ยนกิจกรรมความปลอดภัย ตลอดจนควบคุมการดำเนินงานของหน่วยงานให้สอดคล้องกับกฎหมายความปลอดภัยและสิ่งแวดล้อมรวบรวมสถานการณ์ความเสี่ยงที่มีโอกาสเกิดอุบัติเหตุ อุบัติภัย และเหตุฉุกเฉินต่าง ๆ พร้อมทั้งตอบสนองเหตุการณ์ฉุกเฉิน ดำเนินการฝึกซ้อม ทบทวนและปรับปรุงแก้ไขแผนให้ทันสมัยอยู่เสมอ ตลอดจนดำเนินการสำรวจหลังฟื้นฟูสภาพร่วมกับทีมปฏิรูปฟื้นฟู พิจารณาตรวจสอบและอนุมัติวัตถุประสงค์และเป้าหมายด้านคุณภาพและสิ่งแวดล้อม แผนรวมกิจกรรม/โครงการ ตลอดจนจัดการ และติดตามผลการดำเนินงานโครงการจัดการให้เป็นไปตามแผนวิเคราะห์และกำหนดความจำเป็นในการฝึกอบรมเกี่ยวกับสิ่งแวดล้อม จัดทำและทบทวนแผนการฝึกอบรม รวมถึงงบประมาณค่าใช้จ่าย เสนอขออนุมัติแผนการฝึกอบรม จัดทำแผนกิจกรรมต่าง ๆ เพื่อส่งเสริมให้พนักงานตระหนักถึงผลกระทบ ดำเนินการแก้ไข ตรวจสอบและติดตามผลการแก้ไขปัญหาด้านสิ่งแวดล้อมที่ได้รับจากการร้องเรียนและแจ้งผลการดำเนินงานแก่ฝ่ายประชาสัมพันธ์เพื่อแจ้งข่าวสารต่อไปยังผู้ที่เกี่ยวข้องอนุมัติเอกสารควบคุมManual,Work Procedure, Work Instructionพิจารณาผลการตรวจสอบและวัดผลแจ้งผู้ที่เกี่ยวข้องดำเนินการแก้ไขปัญหาปฏิบัติงานอื่น ๆ ตามที่ผู้บังคับบัญชามอบหมายซึ่งเป็นงานที่เกี่ยวข้องกับลักษณะงานตามหน้าที่ความรับผิดชอบคุณสมบัติเพศชาย/หญิงอายุ28-40 ปี ปริญญาตรี/โทด้านบริหารธุรกิจ, วิศวกรรมศาสตร์ หรือสาขาที่เกี่ยวข้องประสบการณ์การทำงานโรงไฟฟ้าอย่างน้อย5 ปี, ประสบการณ์ทำงานในระดับหัวหน้างานอย่างน้อย 3 ปีมีทัศนคติเชิงบวก ชอบความท้าทาย และสามารถจัดการตนเองได้ทำงานเน้นการสร้างผลลัพธ์ตามเป้าหมายและการพัฒนาทีมงานให้มีศักยภาพสูงขึ้นให้ความสำคัญและรับผิดชอบต่องานของส่วนรวมเรียนรู้และพัฒนาตนเองอย่างสม่ำเสมอในด้านความรู้เชิงเทคนิคในงานและการบริหารทีมมีความรู้ความเข้าใจเกี่ยวกับการเงิน ต้นทุน การลงทุน และการบริหารด้านการเงินโรงไฟฟ้าหากมีความรู้ด้านโรงไฟฟ้าชีวมวลจะได้รับการพิจารณาเป็นพิเศษ

A global leading electronic device organisation is seeking for Operation Director (x1 vacancy) based at their site in Chonburi to lead team and support a large, complex business unit. About the Operation Director Role:This is a great opportunity for the Operation Director to be responsible for ensuring smooth, efficient and safe running of plant by overseeing all daily operations and developing future strategy to reach profitable production performance. The salary range for this role is THB 150k - 180k per month with allowances + bonuses.This is a great opportunity for an outstanding Operation Director to play a vital role to lead, plan, and control all related operation activities, directly reporting to the CEO.Key Responsibilities:Manage overall operations and is responsible for the effective and successful management of labour, productivity, quality control and safety measures as established and set for the operation departmentReviews production and operating reports and resolves operation, manufacturing and maintenance problems to ensure minimum costs and deliver 100% On Time shipmentPlan and monitor the day-to-day running of business to ensure smooth progressSupervise staff from different departments and provide constructive feedbackContribute operations information and recommendations to strategic plans and reviews; prepare and complete action plans; implement production, productivity, quality and resolve problemAn outstanding and progressive Operation Director is required for this rewarding role.Key Requirements:Bachelor's degree or higher-level qualification in engineering with MBA is a plusAt least 15 years' experience in management level in manufacturing environment from various operations functions in automotive, aerospace, electronic or medical equipment industries. Rely on extensive experience and judgement to plan and accomplish goalsGood command of English language in reading, written and oral communicationProven experience in developing and executing strategic plans as well as demonstrate experience in tactical executionThis company needs no introduction and is recognised as the leader in their field of expertise.If you are a driven and determined Operation Director with proven track record of achievements in manufacturing environment, this is an excellent opportunity for you.Apply today for this exciting opportunity. Robert Walters Recruitment (Thailand) LimitedRecruitment License No.: น. 1188 / 2551
